Review.Titre: The product itself is great! However...
Review.Contenu: The product itself is great. This is my second eyeglasses from GUNNAR. I trust this company because I can see only these glasses reflect so much blue light.The first eyeglasses I bought more than a year ago and I had no single issue with it. The one star is for not perfect company's business processes: 1) I received my eyeglasses today with the AMBER 75% blocking blue light lenses, but I ordered AMBER MAX 98%. 2) In order tracking I was asked to upload three photos for PD, which was not necessary in the end.

Review.Titre: Your sales are misleading if you say a…
Review.Contenu: Your sales are misleading if you say a pair of glasses is in the $20 bucket than that is what it should be.  I canceled my entire order because I feel you mislead customers.  You might as well be used car salesman your company lacks integrity by mis advertising.  How can anyone trust your products when you mislead people.

Review.Titre: Wrong tint and the right eye has the…
Review.Contenu: Wrong tint and the right eye has the wrong prescription. I can't use the glasses provided and I want my money back.

I had to back up step-by-step through the purchase process, then step back through it SEVERAL times in order to understand why my shipping was sometimes free and sometimes not.  Shipping costs should be clearly explained, instead of the sale process requiring the customer to experiment and gather data in order to understand those costs.  Worst purchase experience I've recently had to endure.

Review.Titre: Where is my order and where is the…
Review.Contenu: Where is my order and where is the email confirming my order?  I was charged on my credit card but no follow up.

Review.Titre: Never came and no one is emailing me…
Review.Contenu: Never came and no one is emailing me back

The glasses are good, but in total it was just under $100 in charges to have 1 single pair of glasses delivered to my house. On top of that, they actually try to get you to pay "insurance" the guarantee their triple boxed glasses will arrive safely. As if that's not already expected.Good product, absolutely abusive shipping charges. Would not recommend unless you can buy them in store. They also like to spam your inbox if you have any communication with them, but that was easily fixed.

Review.Titre: I was quoted 3-4 day delivery and it’ll…
Review.Contenu: I was quoted 3-4 day delivery and it’ll be 8 days by the time they arrive.

No communication during the order process from start to finish. Asked at end of week three for a status update. Next day the status changes to completed and shipped, I get a tracking email. I have received the glasses and I have been trying to get a frame change because they're prescription and can only get a frame change. I have been waiting for a total of six weeks for a reply from their non-existent customer service. I have submitted two requests and no communication. The reason for my frame exchange request is how severe the curve of the lens/frames are. Don't even get me started on how thin, absolutely thin the frames are.

Worst customer service ever, hands down! First wrong glasses were delivered, then they provided me with RMA, but there was no export invoice attached, and it was stopped by Fedex. Despite multiple emails and chat, nothing was done, no response from customer service. Now I am stuck without glasses. I cannot remember dealing with any worse company than this one

Terrible mailing support service. Locked their MW2 code behind a 60$ Paywall and told me there was no other way to acquire it besides cashing out. while scalpers resell them for 30-45$ online. Other companies like Kontrol Freek have no problems giving theirs out, not locking it behind some paywall. This gave me the incentive to buy their products afterwards just because of their hospitality.

Review.Titre: You offered me a good discount and then…
Review.Contenu: You offered me a good discount and then it was a regular 20% off discount you give to everyone.

From initial order to shipping notification took over a month. That is beyond poor. Since I needed glasses fairly asap, I ordered from another vendor and had them in a WEEK. My inquires were met by some scripted process babble from support. I know BS when I hear it, because I do it myself at work. Hopefully, when the glasses arrive they will change my life and the wait was well worth it.

I ordered the non-prescription glasses. Yet I received a pair that has magnification.  This gives me headaches.... I already wear contacts and have 20/20 vision.  The undesired magnification makes the glasses useless / non functional for me.  I have not heard back from the company on how they will replace the glasses with the ones I actually ordered.

No Customer ServiceI was emailed a 20% off discount for a first time customer.It didn't work.I emailed and called Gunnar and got absolutely no response.I was able to find a 15% off coupon online.At that point I was so frustrated I bought the cheapest pair they offered.Had it worked as they described or had somebody from the company contacted me to sort it out, I would've bought more expensive glasses and, perhaps, gotten two pairs.Their loss.Hopefully it's my gain.We'll see.I'm not feeling terribly confident.

Review.Titre: I received a pair that were slightly…
Review.Contenu: I received a pair that were slightly bent. After reaching out to 2 representatives and submitting a warranty claim. I have yet to get a solid response or the next steps to receiving a replacement pair. The best i’ve gotten so far was to put the frames under warm water and bend them. It’s been since Dec 23 from my first email. It’s now Jan 11

Didn’t respond to message about canceling order.  Sent order anyways.  When I returned order it took multiple emails.  Then charged me return fees.Return fees are from the 1990’s.  Lame customer service and poor processes.

Unable to contact FEDEX shipping. They did not send me the necessary documents and do not respond. It is also impossible to enter your profile on their website. A very negative experience and the distance that it happened, the package is in the country, but I can’t get it because of such a service

Review.Titre: Was supposed to get 20% off purchase…
Review.Contenu: Was supposed to get 20% off purchase from an email. I didn't get it, asked Customer Service. Gave me some run around that my purchase wasn't eligible. Asked where does it say that in the offer. Didn't get a response after that second question. I will return when I receive them.

Review.Titre: I don't need 10 emails telling me I…
Review.Contenu: I don't need 10 emails telling me I have an order coming, on the way, telling me I have something in the cart after I have ordered. Just let me order once, send the confirmation email with the tracking information and be done with it.

Review.Titre: Never received two pair of blue light glasses…
Review.Contenu: Ordered two pair of blue light glasses for eye strain.  Order never arrived even though tracking info said delivered.  Delivery info on tracking label had the wrong City in the address.   I contacted support and explained the situation, and confirmed the address I provided was infact correct and differed from the address they put on the shipping label.  Despite this error on their end,  Terry Albea of support refused to help, told me to file a claim with USPS and that I should have purchased insurance.  This was $150 order, so not a small amount.  Better luck next time I guess. Hopefully the credit card will refund as the company has refused.  I am filing a chargeback.    BUYER BEWARE.re:  Terry's response should tell you everything you need to know.  The order was lost or delivered to the incorrect address.  This company is in the business of shipping goods to customers who purchased.  They will take no responsibility for lost or missing deliveries.  You have been warned.

Review.Titre: Received glasses that look nothing like…
Review.Contenu: Received glasses that look nothing like the website pictures We’re supposed to have an anti reflective coating on both sides, has the opposite, both sides are blue and reflective

Review.Titre: I used to recommend these glasses to everyone, but no more after this year
Review.Contenu: There was very little communication about my order. Support gave me the “within our processing window” excuse for why it took over a month for my glasses to eve ship from ordering. There was no online status updates besides unfulfilled. An now my glasses will not be here until almost 6 weeks after I made the order. I have ordered Gunnar prescription glasses for around a decade now and the process’s has never been this bad. Where I normally ordered them, with my optometrist, stopped carrying Gunnar after being a fan of them due to the horrible business support and extreme lag time between order and fulfillment of prescription glasses. I have loved Gunnar glasses and recommended them to anyone I know but have since stopped recommending them and will probably not order from Gunnar again because of the poor response on these.

Review.Titre: When it came to ordering Gunnar’s
Review.Contenu: When it came to ordering Gunnar’s, it was not what I expected. I went through the prescription glasses and chose a style/frames I liked and wanted. But after waiting a few days and uploading my prescription, I received an email that my choice was not appropriate for my prescription. I was given an excel sheet to choose an appropriate frame and out of the five listed for my prescription, only two were actually available on the site. I do not understand how my options were extremely limited when there was not a disclaimer to notify me of specific prescriptions per frame/style. Otherwise, I would not have bothered to attempt to purchase from Gunnar Optiks.
I only received half my order but on the tracking it said delivered.  I used to get my gunnar glasses from Amazon but tried buying from the website instead.  Big mistake on my part, apparently.

Review.Titre: It’s hard to say what went right
Review.Contenu: It’s hard to say what went right. Gunner lost my order. I had to remind them that I had already paid and they should also give me some glasses. The additional gift that was sent was not prescription, which makes no sense if the rest of your order is prescription.  Almost a month later and I’m still waiting to receive the glasses that I had to work directly with support to have sent.  The support folks are OK though.   It’s  the only good part of this experience.
I have no words to describe how unsatisfied I am with your service! It was the last time that I have ordered from you and I am going to make sure that no Israeli ever will buy from you ever again!

Review.Titre: Not Worth the Expense or the plastic
Review.Contenu: Poorly explained features had me end up with a magnification on my glasses that caused me discomfort and vision issues. They have yet to issue my refund.

Review.Titre: It said that the shipping would have no…
Review.Contenu: It said that the shipping would have no taxes, but they were half the price of the glasses.

Ordered online 2 pairs, received my order in a couple of days. Decided they do not fit my needs and asked for a return. Someone reached out to confirm if I want to return both pairs. Replied to the email to confirm and nobody ever got back to me (followed up every few days with no response) - even opened a new ticket and still no response!

Took longer than expected. Got them for $200 glasses they are not good quality. I had higher expectations for them and I was completely let down. I feel like I’m going to break them. Tried to reach back out to exchange them but never heard a word from them, they sit on the face weirdly.

Review.Titre: The did not get my prescription right, NOT EVEN CLOSE!
Review.Contenu: The did not get my prescription right. Not even close!!!!!! It has been 2 months since I ordered my glasses and I still have not got them back. It took one month to receive the wrong pair, a week to get any hep from them and we’re going on 3 weeks since I sent them in to fix the issue and still last I checked they hand even started to make the new pair, they had received them but not started the replacement. I will not purchase from them ever again!

Review.Titre: I ordered glasses that were supposed to…
Review.Contenu: I ordered glasses that were supposed to be clear lenses. They have a shade to them so whenever I put them on and look at something that is supposed to be white it looks a shade of yellow or brown.

ORDER #3164I did not have a great experience today because I submitted the request with my info to join in the GUNNAR website and I was sent the “Welcome Code” to use on my first order. However, when I tried to use the code… the system would NOT recognize the code. I tried multiple times with no success. After I moved forward with the order, I wrote an email to GUNNAR Support. At this time, I have not received a response. My email stated the following:“GUNNAR Rep - I am wringing because I tried to use the code listed in the Welcome email below but the system/website would not recognize the code listed below (WELCOME20NP). I did process my order since I did not want to miss the purchase of there 2 glasses I'd like to request help with using this % off code. Thank you,.: DF ”I would love to hear how I can be reimbursed for the system not recognizing the code GUNNAR sent me. I feel this is false advertising to lure customers to your website by providing a discount code and then forcing them to pay full price.

Review.Titre: You pretty much cut contact with me up…
Review.Contenu: You pretty much cut contact with me up to the point you sent the package, which delayed me being able to let the courier company know that the shipment was coming, you also sent me two shipping tracking numbers and only one of those worked.
My computer glasses were over compensated and are unusable. It is taking forever to get resolved and I would just like a refund now
I had my correct address and after a few weeks I was emailed saying you guys couldn't send my order until I had a building number even though I gave you a building number in the first place.

Review.Titre: Coming in a week later then expected…
Review.Contenu: Coming in a week later then expected and not even offered expedited shipping or discount or anything. Terrible.

Unhelpful customer service with terrible attitude and no desire to assist.Conflicting statements between the service reps and the guidelines on the website regarding shipping times, CS says 2-4 weeks typically, website’s shipping page says up to 10 days typically.Awful turnaround times for prescription orders, promos that don’t work and require you to contact CS to have a special one granted to you, and the absolute worst:After a long conversation with customer service who blatantly tells me that I’m wrong in stating that they are delayed in my order (which is more than correct according to their website), I state everything that was wrong on their side and she ends up wishing me a good day.As a customer of years with more than several pairs of glasses, including my family, I can say with confidence that after an experience like this I won’t be buying from them any more.

Review.Titre: Everything that could possibly go wrong…
Review.Contenu: Everything that could possibly go wrong did and continues.  The website says BOGO on Black Friday and it only purchased 1 pair. i had to call back for the second pair.  I bought clear lenses and you shipped amber. Support told me they don't have clear only amber and the website is wrong.  i tried to send back and was told they do have clear they were wrong and will ship clear. they shipped amber. I tried to return and had to call for weeks to get someone to respond, nobody every picks up the phone or returns calls. I was told to send them back and they will update and call. that was 3 weeks ago and still no tickets, emails, nor response. It has been over 3 months now and i still can't get my new glasses and have to wear my old broken gunnar pair.Response:  If every effort was made in a timely response, why has it taken 3 months and i still don't have glasses?  Why does your homepage sell "Clear" glasses with the description "Clear GBLF 35 -For discreet protection without the amber tint" then after you purchase explain to me "the clear lenses have an amber tint?"

Review.Titre: Paid for father shipping just shipped…
Review.Contenu: Paid for father shipping just shipped yesterday, won't get it before Christmas

Review.Titre: I paid for express shipping and it’s…
Review.Contenu: I paid for express shipping and it’s not going to be delivered in time.

Review.Titre: This is the 3rd pair I have ordered
Review.Contenu: This is the 3rd pair I have ordered. I used a 15 percent off coupon this time.  Then the next day instagram has a 20 percent off coupon ..  I’m sad 😢
Bad, I paid for 2 day shipping and it has been a week. I have not been reimbursed either…
I will never use this company they love to spam all-day total joke
Unfortunately I received the incorrect lenses and the tracking information on my order was received “after” I had already received the incorrect order…

Review.Titre: When my purchase was auto refunded
Review.Contenu: When my purchase was auto refunded, there was no indication as to what the reason was. I had sent in about 3 or 4 inquiries to get an answer. I also wish that there was some indication as to the max prescription strength permitted for these types of orders. It would have saved me so much time when I was in the selection process.

Sorry I ever did. Do your homework before purchasing compare them to game advantage and you will look away . These glasses don't serve much purpose. I canceled almost instantly paid 15 dollars for fast delivery.  Got a text saying 4 to 6 weeks gamer advantage  2 day delivery tor 3$

Review.Titre: Only part of my order was filled
Review.Contenu: Only part of my order was filled. I was told the shirt wasnt in stock when it was listed for sale online. I sent an email that wasnt responded to for weeks and followed up with a voicemail that also wasnt responded to. When I finally got in contact, my fair request was not granted. Disappointing.

Review.Titre: I received them in the mail with a scratched lens
Review.Contenu: I received them in the mail with a scratch on the left lens. It’s really small but very noticeable when I am playing competitiveFPS games. I called support and left a voicemail including my order number and still haven’t gotten a response. It’s been over 2 weeks…..

No spring, distracting logo etched to lens to start. The real reason I can't use these is: A blue glare on the insides of the lens. No matter how I wear them, when I look at any light source it creates a blue halo effect inside the lenses. I find this ironic, since they are supposed to filter blue light. I have 3 other pair of similar glasses and none of them have this effect. And they all cost 1/10 the price.

Review.Titre: Just bunch of issues with glasses.
Review.Contenu: Just bunch of issues with glasses.Blurriness, feeling sick while and after using them.Smokey effect on them, I guess because of wearing headsets, even thoe they are made for em.All in all, in my personal experience, overall really bad pair of glasses, but a lot of people do love them, so I am assuming it’s something to do with me.

Do not buy from here unless you know how to fill in a glasses prescription form and send it "properly". There is no directions whatsoever and after countless emails and replies with links to the help center, which is where i got the email from, it kept sending me back to the same place. To bad i had to learn by wasting $300 with nothing even being delivered. That's right i still don't have my glasses after a month in a half. I don't even want them anymore, i just want a refund, and even fighting for that is hard.

I received defective glasses, and they have ignored all of my communications. Be careful, if anything is wrong with your order they will just ignore you and keep your money.UPDATE: they replied here saying they would get in touch 'ASAP'. That was a lie, they care about their image enough to reply to reviews but not actually fix the issue.

Review.Titre: Shipping did not arrive as expected and…
Review.Contenu: Shipping did not arrive as expected and the fees added on upon delivery were not properly communicated.  Also Gunnar used their own contact center phone number instead of my contact number so FedEx couldn't call me to inform me of the charges.  100% dissatisfaction and I'm contemplating getting a refund. Not a happy customer.

First of all, I never received an email with my order confirmation or with the tracking number after it was shipped! Second of all, I emailed them about canceling my order (since I didn’t receive anything, and I found it cheaper someplace else), and they never replied back! Very dissatisfied!

Review.Titre: I found your website very difficult to…
Review.Contenu: I found your website very difficult to navigate.  Called for help and the person I spoke with had trouble getting us on the same page.  I finally took a chance and ordered some glasses that I hope work out well.  I even left a phone message to be called back.  That didn't even happen! Bad experience for me.  My order isn't here yet.

Review.Titre: Terrible customer service & haven't received purchase
Review.Contenu: I've called, emailed, & left several messages on customer service's voicemail. There's no one returning my inquiries. I ordered my glasses on 2/16/21 & still haven't received the glasses. Nor has anyone responded to me. I'm filing a complaint to my bank & with whomever necessary? In order to get my refund as it's become obvious at this point, I am not getting the glasses?

Review.Titre: Order never showed up, no one answers phone or calls back ++
Review.Contenu: Order never showed up... called 4 times and had to leave message before someone called me back.  Then shipped the wrong item.  I have already left 2 messages to return the item and get the correct item and no one has called me back.The only good employee there is KENNY in terms of customer service.  This is the last order I will place with them and I've bought several glasses throughout the years.

Review.Titre: I sent two frames in to have new rx…
Review.Contenu: I sent two frames in to have new rx lenses installed.  identical (though different vintage) gunnar frames.  I paid for one and followed up immediately with an email to arrange to pay for the second since that wasn't an option on the website.  Weeks and weeks of waiting a week at a time to get a reply from support only to have glasses that are the wrong lens color and so hyper-reflective that I cannot see through them for the reflections on the inside - they simply present at though I'm trying to look through filthy glass (they've been cleaned over and over.)And again radio silence on support.

Received first pair of glasses & they were crooked & couldn’t easily be fixed. It took 2 emails and 2 calls to customer service and after a week they ent me a new pair. The second pair was equally as crooked. I have again called customer service & emailed and no one has gotten back to me. When you call customer service, I have only gotten voicemail.I am very disappointed with the experience and lack of service at Gunnar.

Review.Titre: i contacted gunnar regarding a small…
Review.Contenu: i contacted gunnar regarding a small issue with my order, i had purchased 2 glasses and one came with a small scratch. i just wanted to replace it but just get a automated email telling and not getting back to me. i have always had good products from gunnar but the one time i have an issue i am very disappoined with the customer service. just wanted to get a replacement for one of the glasses but its like pulling teeth

I've tried to contact the number on the "Not Happy? Give us a call!" card that came in the box several times over the last few weeks, and my voicemail messages have been unreturned.  I wouldn't recommend GUNNAR Optiks, considering that even when you run into minor issues, no one is willing to assist.

Review.Titre: Just wasn’t as effective as I thought…
Review.Contenu: Just wasn’t as effective as I thought it would be. They also don’t have an amber max option with no magnification, so every amber max lens option has magnification to it, causing unnecessary eye strain.Edit: I’m only interested in the amber max option with no magnification, but all amber Max’s have magnification so I’m not interested in any other options unfortunately, instead I’d like to begin a return.Edit #2: they don’t offer return shipping so there’s THAT

Review.Titre: I received broken glasses & no replacement.
Review.Contenu: I received broken glasses after paying for over night shipping so my total was $93. I contacted support and they told me that I would receive an replacement within 2 days. The replacement never came! Now I have to call them back. Except this time I don’t want a replacement I want a refund.

I still have not received my order. For some reason my glasses never shipped. I spoke with customer service who stated they would send the glasses via 2-day shipping but they never provided me with a tracking number and I never received the glasses. I contacted customer support again and they didn't even bother to respond.

Review.Titre: I am giving it a 1 start because I
Review.Contenu: I am giving it a 1 start because I bought the Gunnar glasses as a gift but never received them. So now I am short a present and my money is gone. I reached out but haven’t heard anything back yet. Hopefully this can be sorted out. Will send update.It’s not that I didn’t receive it in time. It’s the fact that I never received it.

Clown Glasses. I ordered the Menlo glasses and once received opened the box to find out they are gigantic frames. Something only a clown would wear. Extremely disappointed. This is the 3rd set of glasses I've ordered from Gunnar and have been disappointed in. Sad, I really want to like them.

Review.Titre: I have not received my order
Review.Contenu: I have not received my order. So, if you are asking for my opinion on the order already, I would have to say poor. Lacking essence. Ephemeral. Maybe we should ask customers for their opinions after they have received the product.Editing my review that was originally posted on Feb 21, 2021. It is now 3/7/2021 and I have not received my order nor heard from anyone at Gunnar. It is starting to seem like I will not be getting the product I purchased and have little confidence I will be able to get a refund.

Review.Titre: I did not like the style and color of…
Review.Contenu: I did not like the style and color of the glasses. I send an exchange request email and send it back to the address which is for returning on Feb,16. Now it is March 9th. Send a second email with no response at all. Eventually, I got the glass on Match 12th. No glass box and valentines box.

Soooooo long to get these, took 6 weeks. Web site stated 2-3 but mine was well over a month. Decided to get these when my current pair broke, should have used a local service that gets them done in hours versus a month and a half…

Review.Titre: I purchased my glasses last week…
Review.Contenu: I purchased my glasses last week Thursday yet still have not shipped i got my tracking but yet no movement what so ever , i called in spoke to customer service was great very polite nice and he said he would look into it hope to get then asap before friday if , not i will request a refund

Review.Titre: Fit is bad and called and haven’t heard…
Review.Contenu: Fit is bad and called and haven’t heard back from them.  I bought 4 glasses that worked great for husband and my 3 boys.  I bought more expensive pair for myself and they actually so uncomfortable and hit ny lashes and i have none.  Buy their cheaper pair at $20 frames are more flexible and better looking they $79 pair is waste of money no curved to hook on ears and inflexible so you cant do anything to make them fit better.  The lenses seems to magnify somewhat and not consistently I didn’t ask for readers or anything.  Very disappointed

I've called your hotline twice regarding the whereabouts of the non-prescription Maverick glasses that I ordered. I've had no response yet and the hotline goes straight to voicemail. Please contact me at your earliest convenience at 519-476-2890.Thanks,Matt Maloney

Very poor customer service! First they charge you huge extra amount for the delivery. Then they even wanted me to pay extra taxes at the arrival, which was no where mentioned!Be cautios with this shop. And then they don´t even refund you your money. Manuel T.

Review.Titre: The customer was good but the quality…
Review.Contenu: The customer service was good but the quality of glasses are way below standard. I don’t know where they make them, I assume China which that alone can speaks volume in regards to Gunner Optix priorities. Profit over Quality.
You charged me for shipping; glasses are ok.

Review.Titre: Ordered $400 pair of glasses and a $5…
Review.Contenu: Ordered $400 pair of glasses and a $5 case. Case was sent, glasses included on tracking for case. Package arrives, only case with “Glasses ship separately” note inside. Receive email asking for review of service. Still waiting on glasses. Check website, wait up to 4 weeks for lenses due to COVID, now I’m in the last week trying to contact ANYONE in their support department and none of the emails work to respond to, they keep getting kicked back. Long story short, I was sent a case and then asked to review services a month before my lenses are supposed to arrive. Haven’t gotten the glasses yet. Here’s the review, I’ll update it once I hear from Gunnar about my lenses.

Purchase made, acceptance of package has been waiting for a week from Gunnar. So 1 star due to me still not even knowing if the glasses are on their way. No package, no updates, just sitting here wondering if I just got ripped off.
