Review.Titre: Ordered a pair of reading glasses and…
Review.Contenu: Ordered a pair of reading glasses and over a month later, and 4 direct contacts, I finally just asked for my money back. Maybe the Covid crisis has really hit the business (which I hope not) but anyways good luck ordering from them.

Order Number: 290013 	Order Date: November 27, 2020 I received my incomplete order, I need my glasses with an enigma prescription, everything else of the order arrived well, how can you solve it? thanks     atte: eduardo rojas

$69 for the glasses $30 for shipping and another $30 for duties. I just don't understand how shipping to Canada is $30 dollars for a pair of glasses , I would have bought 3 pairs if they weren't $130 a pair

It's been over a week since my completed purchase & there has been no communication or updates to the status of my order. Where is my purchase? Please contact me directly because I have not received these glasses.

Well I bought the gunnars and even did the USPS Priority... it’s been late since the 18th (now the 20th of December) and I’m still without them. I’m blaming USPS delivery. Once I receive them I’ll actually give a review

Review.Titre: these glasses are not big enough
Review.Contenu: these glasses are not big enough, although the lense quality  is very nice, I wish I could get the Large Size instead of these regular sized ones.  I a 6 foot 1 inches in hight, and weigh 220 lbs.

Review.Titre: Don't buy from the website, shipping takes FOREVER. Buy from Amazon
Review.Contenu: Don't buy from the website. Go to any other retailer to buy your Gunnars. Gunnars.com charges for shipping and I ordered11 days ago and still waiting for them. Should have bought on Amazon and got 2 day shipping.

It is a shame to knock Gunnar like this, but their shipment choice is also part of the experience. My Fed Ex deliverer decided that it wasn't worth his time, as he simply notet me as not being home in the system, despite my actual staying to wait for him. He also did not leave a note, nor did I recieve notification via Email, after having signed up for it. The best part was customer support though. I waited a few minutes 5-6 before being connected. Then, I heard the phone being held, then put down. The person on the other end then continued to type on their keyboard. I waited for 10 more minutes shouting Hello etc. into the phone...without avail.  I could only recommend Gunnar if you know your Fed-Ex - Guy or Lady etc.

Review.Titre: I was supposed to receive my product 3…
Review.Contenu: I was supposed to receive my product 3 days ago. There is no indication on when it will arrive. I realize that this is on shipping, not Gunnar. Nonetheless, not having the product in hand is disappointing.

Review.Titre: They’re too big for a female Assassin’s Creed fan.
Review.Contenu: These glasses are too wide and too long for a female fan of Assassin’s Creed.  It was disappointing.  Plus they already had a scratch on them before I even tried them on.  I’m sorry but very disappointed.
Completely unimpressed and have requested for a return and refund and no communication back. 3 emails and no replies. Quality is not good and now I'm stuck because the company is refusing to reply.

Review.Titre: Had the exact same order last time came…
Review.Contenu: Had the exact same order last time came no problem. This time FedEx wanted $17 extra dollars before delivering....so it cost almost half as much as my order. THAT'S F@#%ING PATHETIC!

Review.Titre: I purchased my glasses over a month ago…
Review.Contenu: I purchased my glasses over a month ago and still have not received them.  I have tried calling multiple times as well as left multiple voicemails and no one has answered or contacted me back
It had been a whole week and I had received no notification of my package's progress. In fact, upon looking through package tracking, it had not even left its first location.

Review.Titre: Why would you send a review when I…
Review.Contenu: Why would you send a review when I haven't even received the product.  You might want to hold off sending a review request until AFTER the consumer has received the product.
Did not like the glasses at all. They make the screen on my computer brighter than it was before I put them on? I had to squint twice as much. A complete waste of time and money!

Review.Titre: My glasses are not consistent with my…
Review.Contenu: My glasses are not consistent with my prescription and the right lens is way off. I’ve left a message at the Customer Service number but no response. Very disappointed
I've written to customer support three times about updating the shipping address (the wrong state got auto-filled) and have not heard from anyone and its been nearly a week.

Review.Titre: I've contacted Gunnar several times via…
Review.Contenu: I've contacted Gunnar several times via e-mail and phone asking for assistance in selecting the proper prescription glasses and never heard back. Very disappointing.

Review.Titre: Received my pair of glasses quickly…
Review.Contenu: Received my pair of glasses quickly but, noticed the lenses are magnified, like reading glasses. Completely worthless for what I’m using them for. Would return if I could
Good experience at first, but the glasses were flawed and the process of fixing the issue should have been easier
The label only was created, but is not shipping yet. I did the purchase last Monday. Today is Wednesday and is not information available to check the status.

Review.Titre: It is taking too long for my glasses to…
Review.Contenu: It is taking too long for my glasses to get to me. The three-week waiting period is not obvious and much longer than any other vision store. I needed the glasses quickly to prevent migraines and could have had something weeks ago if I had gone with another company.

Earlier orders betterI've ordered several classes, prescription, blue blockers, and sunglasses. loved them all, the last set seems to have a dizzying effect or telescopic in reverse... (same prescription as other orders) not sure why. I've been too busy to inquire and just used my old glasses, again same prescription. Love the frames, hopefully when i have time i can inquire about what went wrong or change the lenses to something better. may just go elsewhere.

Review.Titre: I was very disappointed in the entire…
Review.Contenu: I was very disappointed in the entire online ordering experience. I applied for the discount code to be send to me. It arrrived over 12 hours later.I went ahead and ordered at full price because I desperately needed to replace my other Gunnar glasses originally bought at Game Stop.After paying full price I got a notice for shipment that will arrive 6-7 days after purchase. Holy smokes. I will now suffer a full week of migraines and pain for full price glasses while they slowly transit from CA to GA. I love the product but will go out of my way to purchase through a reseller in the future.

Website format difficult, nearly impossible to understand whether glasses would fit on wider heads like mine.   I know there’s a lot of information there, but it’s not digestible for decision making.   That last part is super important.

I would have done a 5 star review but i almost fell for bug in the website. I was being redirected to paypal and then back to the website and good thing i decided to look at the price because all the sudden it went from a 120$ purchase to a 400$ price. So somehow between the rederection, something happen that my ordered was multiplied by 3. So please be careful, checkouts are speedy now in days and this could have been a stressful situation.

The frame is sturdy but the lens give me a headache. They have a slight zoom on them and also some distortion occurs. Not to mention walking with them on causes dizziness. I cannot keep them on for a long time.

Review.Titre: I wanted to purchase through Amazon
Review.Contenu: I wanted to purchase through Amazon, they seemed to have faster shipping as opposed to Gunnar except they didn't offer this one style I wanted.  Also tracking is easier through Amazon in their overall portal.  Instead of a 3-5 day turn around I'm getting it in 10 days.

The company failed to meet delivery time twice.I placed my order on 05/14. The fulfillment was expected to be completed by 5/30. On 05/30, they promised a tracking number. It is 06/12, and I barely got my tracking number. I'm disappointed, and upset because I asked for a cancellation multiple times.

After being able to order there was no way to track my order. I never received a confirmation email but I did receive 3 emails after being charged saying I still had items in my cart and did I want to continue my purchase. I tried to create an account but it keeps telling me to follow the steps to complete in the email that I still have never received. At this point all I know is my card was charged but who knows if the purchase was really made or if I’ll actually receive anything. I guess I just have to wait and see if a mysterious package shows up one day.

Review.Titre: Payment toGunnar or or acknowledgment of order did not occur
Review.Contenu: When I submitted my payment to Gunnar, there was no indication of progress, nor any indication that my order was actually submitted.I’m very concerned about future business with Gunnar optics because they are based in California.In my view working with a company based in California is risky. For example, I have to purchase a special insurance policy just so my package won’t be stolen or if it is that there is reimbursement.This is not a good way to do business and I’m very concerned about future business with Gunnar, because of where they are located.

Review.Titre: These glasses don’t function well, subpar quality
Review.Contenu: Paid $90 for the intercept version smh. Frames feel like $20 vans sunglasses, logo on side is cheap plastic. There’s a blue glare when blocking “blue light rays” and the outdoor tint barely works. The only thing I like is the shape of the glasses and the amber color works.

Review.Titre: hopefully the glasses are as nice as they claim..
Review.Contenu: Well I signed up for emails and got a 20% off promo code that said it could be used on my first order. Then at checkout it said that the promo code could not be used. No fine print stating why.. Straight BS**UPDATE**Customer service reached out and honored my 20% off. Awesome customer service and response time.

Review.Titre: I received the glasses a month ago
Review.Contenu: I received the glasses a month ago, I have written several emails with the purpose of changing the frame of the glasses because the ones I purchased are very heavy, they told me that they are going to send an email so that I can send them to you and until today I have not received, please send me the address and I can get the desired change!!  Thank you for your cooperation in this situation.

This is no way a knock on the brand.  Their checkout experience was not great.  I made a purchase.  I wanted to cancel the transaction that was made less than 5 minutes before, to pick up another 2 pairs.   The fact that I could not, just made a negative impression.  This after, I ordered a pair from them on Amazon, and I was sent a used pair. Short and Sweet: Glasses Great! Customer Journey not so great.

I like the glasses that I received but they took longer than expected to arrive. Also, the coupon that I was sent for my birthday was not accepted and the free case that I was offered (and was on my order) was not sent.
New welcome customer discount code didn’t work.I did reach out to their support but the code they gave has exclusions! I’m still awaiting a response.

Review.Titre: The reason I rated 2 stars is I tried…
Review.Contenu: The reason I rated 2 stars is I tried to use the code WELCOME20NP for me to save 20% as advertised in your homepage, but it did not work. I tried it in multiple browsers with no avail.
Initial order was all mixed up, but Gunnar is making it right. Deeply appreciate the personal customer service. Thanks Terry.

Review.Titre: I am not happy about paying $10 for…
Review.Contenu: I am not happy about paying $10 for exchanging my glasses which were to big.
2 much spam in my mail. Had already ordered, buy had like 10 mails simce I was about to order something else too.

Review.Titre: I haven’t gotten my glasses yet until…
Review.Contenu: I haven’t gotten my glasses yet until than y’all get to stars

Review.Titre: I like the glasses but why didn’t you…
Review.Contenu: I like the glasses but why didn’t you notice that I had to pay custom fee which is 26 $ Ca . It cost me a lot.

Review.Titre: I wanted to put the code for the free…
Review.Contenu: I wanted to put the code for the free case but it wouldn’t let me.

I have been a Gunnar Optiks fan for many years now and have always bought my computer glasses from Gunnar Optiks.  I recently had a problem with an rx order and was told someone should be back with me within 1-3 business days.  We are now on business day 10+ and it’s a disappointment to me.

Review.Titre: I ordered one pair of ( Haus ) model…
Review.Contenu: I ordered one pair of ( Haus ) model and the one of lenses are bigger than different. So sad about this can t return glasses because our post services are bad and they can deliver only on 3-4 weeks and its expensive. Great customer service but poor quality. ( First time buying )

Review.Titre: I like the style of the glasses and the…
Review.Contenu: I like the style of the glasses and the tint of the lens but they give a slight magnification and it really hurts my eyes. I don't need actual glasses and my vision is fine but when I put on these glasses it is extremely obvious to me that there is some magnification.  It's very slight and it's probably 1.05x or 1.1x but it really hurts my eyes and makes them totally unusable for me

I had the worst delivery experience through FedEx.Please do not use this company to deliver your goods to Ukraine.There is no FedEx in my country, but we have a subsidiary of FedEx TNT Express which charges twice as much for customs clearance as customs duties and taxes.

Review.Titre: Like the style, too much glare on camera
Review.Contenu: I like the style, fit, and tint of the glasses. However, these glasses have an incredible amount of glare on Zoom... so much that meeting participants can see my entire screen reflected in detail in each lense. I should have considered this before buying, but didn't see a glare "feature" pointed out anywhere.

Production description did not indicate that the frame is of a matte construction. I had to look at several photos to try to ascertain the material, but to no avail. Unfortunately I did not want to order any glasses with matte frame construction and will have to return the glasses.

The glasses I ordered (Haus) were ones I'd ordered in the past. I enjoyed them so much, that I couldn't wait to get a spiffy new pair. Unfortunately, the "clear" lens I ordered still had a bit of an amber tint to them. Glasses I ordered in the past haven't been like this, so I can only guess they changed their "clear" lens. It's not a look I enjoy, so I'll only be wearing these glasses when I'm not on camera or out in public. Very disappointing.

Careful if you are ordering and you live in Canada. There is a $30 shipping charge when you purchase online, but what they don’t tell you is upon delivery the driver requests an additional $23 for duties. Ended up paying the same in shipping as the glasses cost almost. If I had known about the extra charge I would not have purchased. They should inform Canadian buyers of these extra charges, but they don’t. Not transparent. Product itself is fine.

I feel that the quality of Gunnar glasses has declined in most recent purchase. I bought a second pair of Onyx Intercept. My first pair is great but this time, the frame felt uniquely brittle. Also the lens does not sit within the frame correctly, as it seems to slide around unlike my last pair that I bought 6 months ago. I think the only thing that I do like is the quality of the lens.

I have bought the Torpedo - Onyx - Amber and after using them for 30 minutes in overwatch my eyes and head start to hurt .First thing i noticed is that the eyeglasses distort a bit and you will have a curved image . I think the headache is from the +0.2 diopter that they added but there is no way i can know if the pair i bought has a diopter because there isn't anything specified on the product description .Waste of money for me . I will give them 2 stars because of the ok-ish build quality

The product itself serves its purpose and I like the glasses. The issue is that both lenses at the top edges have the same, identical crack/break in them. This appears to be a defect as the lens have not been dropped or misused in any way. I keep them in the pouch when not in use. I reached out to customer support but it has been 4 business days and I have not received a response.The reason for the low rating is due to the lack of response from Gunnar.

Review.Titre: The website has the look a feel of an…
Review.Contenu: The website has the look a feel of an old flash site. The selectors were busted I some cases. The listing would show two colors and if you pick the unavailable one and go to the product page, it'll tell you to select a lens, but you can't. It produces an erroneous messy. The products good, so either business people are interfering with look and feel of you need to find good web designers/developers.

Review.Titre: I wanted to return the Gunnar I bought…
Review.Contenu: I wanted to return the Gunnar I bought for my daughter and order another one from Gunnar's site. There was no easy way for me to do it. I left voice mails which no on responded to.The Lens themselves are fine but the customer service function does not exist.

The glasses took almost a month to arrive. We never had a tracking number to see how was the process going. The glasses came without case, which is supposed to arrive later from an email they sent a few days before the glasses arrived. We wrote a couple of emails to see how was the process or why it was delayed but never had a prompt reply. It was a birthday gift and it arrived super late (with no case).

Review.Titre: I've so far have waited a week to get…
Review.Contenu: I've so far have waited a week to get the order processed. Now it's currently still waiting to be picked up by USPS. Not sure what's going on. I sent an email to support to get an update, but no one responded to me. I get things are a little hectic right now, but just a quick email back and let me know what's up would have been nice. Hopefully they will come in later this week.

I purchased the TORPEDO bundle, and honestly, the glasses aren't what I expected. They have a very cheap plastic feel. Including the lenses. (If you've ever worn safety glasses, that's how they feel.) I've had my eye on GUNNARS for quite some time, and I expected something of higher quality. All together this pair of glasses cost me $105 but feels like it's worth $10-$15 at Walmart. :(

I ordered prescription Gunnars. Responses back took a week+ to arrive and were abrupt to the point of being rude. I still haven't received my glasses. I don't think I'd recommend that others get prescription Gunnars.

Your product is acceptable, but your emails are horrendously annoying.You also offered me multiple offers for discounts for having purchased some of your glasses.People don't buy 20 pairs of glasses, they only need one. So either you are just spamming me with illogical offers or you expect people to want different pairs, which would suggest there's something wrong with them, or you expect less than satisfactory responses.

Honestly not worth the price.Pros: Look stylish         Feel comfortable when using headset for extended period of time.Cons: Really flimsy frame          Not sure if they work, eyes seem the same w/ or w/o them.Overall:  The price doesn't justify the use of these.   Seem like any gun shooting safety glasses with yellow tint I've used before for way less.

Review.Titre: Hope fate is on your side
Review.Contenu: I wanted to see if I could change my order about an hour after I hit buy.  I called and ended up with an answering machine.  I left my number as requested.  Never heard back.  I suspect their customer service policy was copied straight out of Atilla the Huns diary.  Think hard about the order before you hit buy.  Cuz after that, it’s up to the Gods.

Ordered for natural focus glasses but I received an item with magnification. Their customer service was professional and helped me with the exchange process but the time it takes to receive an exchange item which takes a week is basically my time wasted for an item that i was eagerly waiting for. I wish i could give a higher rating but I am just a little angry/sad

Review.Titre: I bought these glasses because i bought…
Review.Contenu: I bought these glasses because i bought the same kind without prescription, and i liked them so i got them with my prescription. They're great except that the outside of the lens is way thicker than the rest of it, and because it's curved it creates a weird looking parallax on my face when you look straight on. Making my eyes and sure if my head look away smaller than they are :(

The order was processed and delivered very quickly, however, the quality of the glasses was not what I expected for the price.  The lenses work well enough, but the frame seems to be very cheaply made and delicate, I feel like I might break them simply by picking them up.

Review.Titre: Paid $30 dollars for the over night…
Review.Contenu: Paid $30 dollars for the over night shipping. Ordered it early Saturday morning(I know their business days are Mon.-Fri.) So it should have got sent out Monday and should have arrived Tuesday. It didn't get sent out until Tuesday and we received it Wednesday. And we didn't receive an item we ordered.

Love Gunnar optiks haven’t gotten my glasses yet but they sure made it pleasurable and reassuring that I’m with a great customer service based team. I’ve forgotten the discount and not even in a blink of an eye they helped me get it discounted and now I’m happy. You go GUNNAR optiks favorite place to shop

Review.Titre: Great styling, but avoid the readers.
Review.Contenu: The focal length for their reader versions seem to be quite off.  I have other readers, but I don't need to be anywhere near as close to the text to see.  For computer glasses, they really should be focused about 14 inches out or so.  So, sadly I had to return mine.  Unfortunately, returns are taking a very very long time.  My glasses were received by them more than two weeks ago, but still no notice of a refund in spite of multiple emails back and forth about the 'accounting office'

Happier and healthier eyes!However, I do have a complaint as the lenses weren't clean on arrival, and despite the fact that they cleaned up well, there are defects on the lenses which have proved to be a constant irritation. Not worth shipping them back due to the costs involved. Disappointed.

Review.Titre: Some how the product was sent to the…
Review.Contenu: Some how the product was sent to the wrong address. I am working with Gunner to fix this but this being COVID times I am sure it will take sometime to work out. I should not fill out the review yet but this might help someone see that something went wrong and it would be cool if they fixed it.

So my glasses have came in and they were supposed to have a prescription on them. It came with a prescription but only in the dead center. And I was told that the Rx department was gonna reach out to me shortly. it's almost been 2 days now and I keep asking if you know they might have the wrong email on file but, They say it's fine. I love the company and love the products. But, I wish they wouldn't tell you something if it wasn't going to be what's actually going to lead to false promises.

Review.Titre: The glasses I received were incorrect…
Review.Contenu: The glasses I received were incorrect (reading rather than computer). Although initial response time to my query was relatively fast, after that I was not able to get any follow up information

Prescription is basically unusable, I can't seem to focus my eyes properly and the strain is worse than it was before.  I understand  purchases are non-refundable and I get why, but it's unfortunate.  I knew I was taking a chance ordering something like this online.  Expensive lesson.

Review.Titre: My order was for two pairs of glasses
Review.Contenu: My order was for two pairs of glasses, I only received one. I do love them, but it's only half of what I've already paid for. Would give a 4 to a 5 otherwise, though much of the issues may not be under the company's control, but part of the pandemic situation.

Review.Titre: The glasses are rather cheap feeling…
Review.Contenu: The glasses are rather cheap feeling for the price paid.  I also tried and tried to find out where they made these.  I took a chance, but once the glasses came the temple said they were made in China, I could not find this information on their website or any review about the company and product.  Live and learn I guess and do more research.  I post this just to let others know the country of origin for those interested.  I have only used them for a couple of days, but I would have gone with the lighter clear tint and the inability to adjust the nose bridge is a negative.

While the product I received the RPG glasses are great. They were shipped to the wrong city initially and when I contacted FedEx they said Gunnar could request a refund for the shipping and duty. I contacted Gunnar to get them to do so and they still haven't done anything about it.

Review.Titre: Received Phenom with lens out of frame…
Review.Contenu: Received Phenom with right lens not in frame, floating around during shipping.Placed lens back in frame and it was out of tolerance enough to to move .75mm (Laterally) after frame was tightened Had to register glasses to start any process to remedy (this is issue because they were purchased from the Gunnar website AND entering information for out of box failure is not in my information security interest).Once registered, to get fixed/replaced would have had to coordinate and pay for return shipping.No longer worth my time and effort- taped and into garage toolbox they go.

The pair of glasses I got came in a box that smelled really bad when I opened it. I also have a problem where I can see my own reflection through the lenses and it is very distracting. Otherwise, the prescription was correct and it fit well... after I cleaned the smell off.

Review.Titre: They sent me the wrong frame size
Review.Contenu: They sent me the wrong frame size. *Edit* Additionally they glued my frames together and the glasses look completely different from the view on the website. No money back guarantee… I can definitely see why now.

Review.Titre: Love the glasses, but not for lengthy use.
Review.Contenu: I love the glasses first and foremost! Some of the greatest blue light filter lenses I’ve used. I work with a computer day in and day out and don’t need prescription glasses but use the pair I got from you all. I also wear them while playing my Xbox. With all that said, I cannot wear these glasses for longer than an hour or two without my ears hurting and it becoming unbearably uncomfortable! I initially thought it was just a “breaking in” issue and overtime wouldn’t be any further concern. The longer I use the glasses, the more I find myself taking them off and not wanting to put them back on which entirely defeats the purpose of purchase.

Review.Titre: Still waiting for an itemized receipt
Review.Contenu: I have ordered almost the exact same product before and requested an itemized receipt for insurance purposes and received it very quickly, however this time, I have put in at least 2 separate requests for an order I placed over a month ago with no response.

Review.Titre: I ordered a bad RX version of the glasses…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a RX version of the glasses and my vision is very blurry.   My first time ordering online and I don't know if it is the glasses or my eye doctor made a mistake (been with him for 15 yrs)   At the moment I payed $200 for glasses I cannot use.

I ordered a pair of glasses through Gunnar and they came damaged. The right lens is popped off and I’ve called multiple times and no answer and left multiple voicemails and no one has answered me. I was really looking forward to using the glasses.

Review.Titre: Shipping costs $29.95, Plus additional $22.50 FedEx costs
Review.Contenu: shipping fees are outrageous ($30.00) plus another $22.50 for FedEx shipping costs.as were from Canada, we had to pay the exchange rate plus additional shipping fees.  The glasses were only $79.99 US + $29.95 (via FedEx International Delivery) which came to $109.94 US, converted to $154.00 CAN.  Then had to pay the additional $22.50 FedEx costs.  Why did we have to pay the additional shipping costs?  this was not indicated when purchasing the glasses.  The exchange & shipping was more than the actual glasses themselves.Not pleased & would request a refund of the additional shipping costs as $29.95 US is more than enough to ship a small pair of glasses.
I rate it 3 stars because I didn't get a confirmation email from my order. The only way I could tell my order went through is because I can see the funds pulled from my account

Review.Titre: Was not expecting such a difference in magnification
Review.Contenu: I was not prepared for the magnification.  I often have to consult written notes and texts while using my computer for work, and the magnification of the glasses quickly gave me a headache to the point that I had an upset stomach.

Review.Titre: So far we've gotten 4 emails promoting…
Review.Contenu: So far we've gotten 4 emails promoting new products and asking for reviews. 0 emails that include a receipt, tracking information, order status, etc. At least let the ink dry on my current order before bombarding me with spam!

Review.Titre: It didn't help me at all... my eyes still hurt.
Review.Contenu: My eyes always dry and hurt while using computer \ watch TV.I tried these glasses but unfortunately it didn't help me at all and using them made my eyes hurt even more.I purchased and tried both the 35 (clear) and the 65 (amber)lens.

Review.Titre: To be honest everything was good except…
Review.Contenu: To be honest everything was good except the glasses . The plastic looks good but thr built quality and stuff is not what I expected.  It feels cheaply done the pictures make them look different for a 120 dollars and I feel at most I would pay is 75 to a minimum of 50 dollars . They bend so much and creek. The lenses part is not very stable on the ends of them to thr frame . They have so much gap between them. I'll still use them but they work so yeah . I won't tell you to look else place they have a good selection and its probably just the ones I picked didn't suit my thoughts fully on what I expected.  I'm sure there other ones are alot better.

Defective product.The glasses do help with the glare but the hinges on one of the glasses we ordered don't open fully making them almost impossible to use.  Considering the cost of the glasses this kind of shoddy product is inexcusable.

Review.Titre: Good product but terrible customer service.
Review.Contenu: Spoke to a reb before purchasing my Gunnars, Before I made my purchase I had asked if there were any specials or promotions going on. I was informed that there were none. So I made my purchase and literally a few hours I was being targeted advertised 10 - 20% off my purchase on social media and other website ads. These werent some weird 3rd party adverts they were directly from Gunnar so I tried to cancel my order so I could reorder them (all this within 24 hrs mind you) and I was told that there is no way to cancel my order but a return label could be sent to me at a cost. Which at that point is pointless.Good product but dont rely on their reps.

Glasses came the next day after it was shipped. I am impressed with the glasses. The glasses fit very well and they're comfortable. I no longer get headaches and my eyes don't feel tired anymore. Customer service needs work tho. After wearing the glasses for 2 months, the lenses broke and I have tried contacting customer service and they're not responding back to me. I have paid $109 for these glasses and they're not doing anything. They don't even care about their customers...I'm very disappointed. I will make sure this review goes to people and make sure my family and friends do not buy from your site.

Review.Titre: Be more specific for international shipping
Review.Contenu: Didn't like how I had to pay $20 shipping and then they charged $20 again for import and duties fees. It was not on the website I thought $20 was the flat fee. In the future it would be nice to see estimated duties as a maximum.

They didn't ship my order until I called 3 weeks after placing my order. At checkout they notify you that there could be a week delay before shipping due to COVID. Although they shipped my glasses after I called, they blamed the post office even though I could see from the tracking that the post office was never given the package (only the shipping label was created). They said I could keep the both pairs if they arrive...right. Don't expect to receive your glasses after ordering.This is my first day wearing the glasses and they do seem to reduce eye strain. I would recommend they don't spam my email asking for reviews before they had even given me the product I paid for.

The frames I ordered are too narrow for my face (I don’t remember having size options). And unlike my last pair (probably from 2013), I’m finding reading text on screens through these Gunnars to be very difficult.

Review.Titre: I order the teen version and they are…
Review.Contenu: I ordered the teen version and they are still way too big. Can only wear them for a little at a time before I start to get an optical headache. They are good for night driving but for computer work, not so much.

The lenses are fine, but the frames are too small (too narrow at the temple). I saw that this was a common issue once I realized how much they were hurting and looked at more of the negative review, but this was not until after I had already purchased them and tried to wear them for a few weeks. They ultimately cause me headaches due to being too tight. I am a woman with a fairly small to average size head so do not see how most people could possibly wear these. I purchased the Cruz and wish I had realized this issue in time to return them. Ultimately these ended up being a waste, and I am reluctant to purchase any others from Gunnar due to the sizing issues.

Review.Titre: I cannot actually review this because i…
Review.Contenu: I cannot actually review this because i made a mistake in my order..i wanted to get an eyeglass without magnification but i ordered the one with magnification. I cannot bring it back because i need to pay again for the shipment back

I was hoping to get anti glare and anti reflection glasses, because other computer glasses was very reflective both from outside and from the inside. Although Gunnar glasses are advertised as anti reflective, they are not 100% reflection and glare free. I have a window in the back, and the light coming from behind reflects from inside the glasses and I see reflections of my own eye and light area coming from the window. They are maybe 30% less reflective than regular $20 computer glasses. Quality of the glasses is good, much better than my $20 glasses, they don’t slip. They are on the wider side, a bit wider near the temples than I would expect, but don’t  look too wide.

Review.Titre: Its exactly a month, still no product.
Review.Contenu: There's nothing else to say. Bought a month ago, promised multiple times the item had been shipped and still don't have it in my hand. The amazing part? This company is headquartered like 35 minutes from my house...

Review.Titre: Shipping to the EU is not worth it
Review.Contenu: It’s a shame to have to give these glasses a 2 star review. While they are decent the company’s policy in shipping to the EU is ridiculous. I paid an initial shipping cost of 30 euros to get them shipped to Germany, then one week later I received another bill from their courier asking for another 30 euros as it passed through the UK. I was never told this upfront at the time of purchase, therefore, had no choice in the matter. I ended up paying 60 euros in shipping costs. I could’ve bought another pair of glasses for that price. The transparency is not there, and this company does not engender trust. I wrote to customer support and was told “we try to be upfront”, well, you failed at “trying”. Disappointing.

Review.Titre: The glasses are great but the customer…
Review.Contenu: The glasses are great but the customer service is ridiculous. Emailed and called and still no reply. They charged my account four times one of which was the actual charge and only refunded me one out of three of them.

Purchased haus reading glasses sept 1st. for full price ($99.99usd). one day later, Sept 2nd i receive an email from gunnars regarding a sale, get 2 pair for $95.00.I contacted gunnars and asked if they would honor this sale given i purchased my glasses 1 day prior without any knowledge of the upcoming sale. I was willing to pay shipping on the second pair. Unfortunately, gunnars support didn't find me, as a repeat customer, valuable enough to even respond to my request. This is a good example of how to take a loyal customer and treat them with disrespect. Good job gunnars. Because I do like gunnars i am giving this a 2 star rather than a 1 star which is what i feel like giving at the moment.

I bought three Gunnar ( dark ale, division 2 and Infinite ) all together for me and my siblings. These glasses are only good at slight magnification, that is why I am giving two star otherwise, they don't really help much as they are suppose to block the glare too along with the blue light of computer and other digital screens. But after wearing the glasses the glares are always their and that causes strain. I would not suggest anyone to buy these. Not only the poor quality glare protection, it actually increases it. I ordered it from US to India. They did charge me the shipping cost but they did not mention it on the box which lead to increased import fee by custom.

Review.Titre: Send a confirmation email and tracking…
Review.Contenu: Send a confirmation email and tracking with the order. I have nothing from this company and have no idea when and if I even will be getting my order. But the money already was processed so none of that makes any sense.

As of this time I have not gotten my prescription glasses.  Was told 4 weeks.  Got an email saying they were off to the lab and allow 2-3 more weeks.  3 weeks elapsed.  I get a tracking number.  Package arrives.  It's just a 2nd item, a case, that I ordered, no glasses.  I reach out to customer service, get automated email to allow 3-5 business days to respond.  Meanwhile the website says my order is completed, no further status.  For all I know this might sort itself out tomorrow.  But who knows?Prescription glasses seem to pose a communication and order status problem for Gunnar.  Has not been a delightful experience and surely not cost effective for Gunnar with all the support "churn" it causes.
Made my purchase online then I was ignored until I questioned where it was 13 days later and it still wasn’t shipped. It is now shipped but not yet received. Now they ask for a review. Here it is.

Review.Titre: Would not recommend buying - hidden fees and duties
Review.Contenu: The glasses are fine, but the problem is the transparency, shipping and the whole handling process with the import taxes. Bought 2 items on Black Friday with a discount code that gave 15%, but then the shipping to EU was more or less the same amount as the discount, which is fine, but the problem arrived a couple of days after I received the package. I got an invoice from FedEx with import duties of 25% AND 15% administration fee AND around 5% tax on the fee. This is just genius considering there was NO VISIBLE information on Gunner's website about any processing or import fees, even after I have specified the shipping address to be the EU. I would never buy Gunnar glasses again even though they are fine and I will avoid FedEx in general.

Review.Titre: Not a fan of the tint
Review.Contenu: Not a fan of the tint. The actual glasses them self are top quality but between that and the small amount of magnification I wasted my money. They hurt more to wear than not.

Review.Titre: Very slow return policy still waiting
Review.Contenu: The people that I dealt with were very nice but I'm giving only two stars is because of the process and hassle to get my refund back to me which I still haven't gotten.
I bought an available product and they wasn't send u til a week later, they never answered my email and i still waiting my lenses. I can't talk about the product yet.

Review.Titre: Good for long distance but not for reading
Review.Contenu: It attaches well, and is good for long distance viewing but for not good for reading as the hinges that attach to the glass come in the line of sight and cause discomfort

Review.Titre: two stars because I feel dizzy and get…
Review.Contenu: two stars because I feel dizzy and get headache when I use it for a long period of time (+1 hr) and I lost some details on images but I think that could be "normal"

Review.Titre: Prescription not accurate due to the…
Review.Contenu: Prescription not accurate due to the curve of the lens in this model. I have a different gunnar model with the same exact prescription which I use daily.
you sent them out quick, which is great, but I don't feel like they help me at all, actually, I feel like my eyes are more strained with them.

Review.Titre: I wanted to add another item to the…
Review.Contenu: I wanted to add another item to the order before shipping, but It is not possible. I wrote to ask for help, but they answered after my order was shipped.
Not worth the money.  The glare on these glasses for gaming in a dark room is terrible.  I will not be buying another pair.  regret my purchase

Review.Titre: Why don't you offer the full array of…
Review.Contenu: Why don't you offer the full array of lens options for all of your frames? I found a frame that i liked, but it only came in clear tint when i needed amber. Even worse, i found frames with amber tint lenses, but natural focus was not an option!! I imagine most people are wearing these over contacts or don't have corrected vision and do not want a prescription. "Gunnar Focus" is useless, as those of us needing a prescription would likely have specific needs. At least offer non-prescription natural focus lenses to fit all your frames. Offering all lens tints for all your frames would make a lot of sense too. I expect a third party seller not to have all options, but not the manufacturer site.

During the process of ordering glasses the cost of shipping went from $4.95 to $8.95 without any explanation. I know that it's not a lot, but at least some kind of explanation would have been nice and being on a fixed income every penny counts these days.

Review.Titre: The website constantly showed the pop…
Review.Contenu: The website constantly showed the pop up for email entry to give 20% off first purchase. While the offer is great, the constant pop ups on each page in the browser tab made it quite frustrating and almost left the site altogether. The virtual try on also didn't properly work with the glasses types and kept glitching out. Regardless, still purchased a pair because of need however I advise some adjustments be made to the constant and annoying pop up and improving virtual try on

Website easy to navigate, prices seemed high but when glasses arrive I'll be able to see what the quality of the product is. Did I get what I paid for?  Virtual try on did not work well, glass es were the correct model but they were not the color that I chose.

Poor communication.  Took over 45 days to get my prescription glasses and they were "lost".  Lots of headaches to get them redone.  That being said this was an anomaly.  I have purchased dozens of glasses from gunnar without issue.  Oh and Gunnar why did you send female child glasses as my mystery box, you clearly have my measurements lol

When using the website. I was annoyed by the filters. I tried to look for Rimless and SemiRimless and the result was zero. I selected just the Rimless and seperately the semiRimless. If you are going to have a filter like that and allow selectable filter options that are no combined or additive filters. Then the selection should change to force only one option instead of allowing multiple selection. Other than that, I love the Glasses. I had broke the frames of my previous set. These will be the second set in 13 years because they are durable.

please add a description that people shipping to uruguay must pay another 50~ usd to get the package since they reckon it as a optic glass like if it was a prescription one istead of as regular glasses.im sad, not towards you but towards the uruguayan scamming system. i could bought another pair that i need for me for this amount.will try to buy from amazon or to give it on hand by myself instead of trusting a delivery system even if it is the 30~ usd from gunnar.besides that nothing to say against the glasses, good as always.

My only complaint were the filters on the site that either don’t work or don’t have many options to filter which makes shopping frustrating. For example i can’t filter by frame color or even lens type. If I wanted to find some glasses that had the “amber max” lens I would have to click thru each pair to see if it was available. Fortunately I was able to get help thru the online chat feature and the rep that helped me was really helpful.

Review.Titre: You should base your free shipping…
Review.Contenu: You should base your free shipping offer on the subtotal of the order, not after applied promo codes and discounts. Cost me another 9$ because I used the welcome code for signing up for emails.

Review.Titre: This was my second time buying…
Review.Contenu: This was my second time buying prescription Gunnars. I've been using Gunnar's glasses since 2009. The first time around, service was great. I knew what was happening. Gunnar staff were responsive when I asked a question. This time, in buying a backup pair, the customer service was sadly lackluster. I asked two questions, the first of which was never answered, and the other question I had to ask multiple times. So, I must ask a third question: Is customer service a dying art form?

Review.Titre: The website would freeze when I would…
Review.Contenu: The website would freeze when I would make a selection on the Product Information Page for a specific style.  The pages weren't responding after every click and I would have to refresh.  I think there is good information on the site, huge opportunity for better response time between clicks.  I haven't received the product yet so can't review that yet but excited about the collaboration pairs.
You emailed me a 20% discount code when I signed up for your newsletter.  Didn't mention any restrictions.  When I applied code to my purchase, it would not accept.  Therefore rating of 3.

Review.Titre: Fast and easy shipping, but still some big issies
Review.Contenu: Fast and easy shipping. Payed about 100 € for the Stark blue light filtering glasses, they look really cool, bit in my opinion they are not in the good quality I was hoping to. I would rather prefear to pay double of the price and have a really good quality. The secend thing I really disslike is, the cool looking etui and everything else except the glasses, have a very strong smell, like it is some kind of cheap chinese cancer causing material.If this will be changed, I am definetelly ordering again.

Review.Titre: Good product, checkout a little confusing
Review.Contenu: For the most part this was a good experience. I liked the selection of styles and found a pair I liked. I have a older design that seems to be discontinued but found one very similar. My biggest issue was at checkout. As I filled out my information I used the auto-fill and got the shop app prompt for a verify code. As soon as I entered code it seemed to skip Gunnar checkout and go to shop app checkout. I was not able to enter the welcome first purchase discount code. I went ahead and completed the purchase.  Just a little frustrated couldn't get the discount.
The prescription options are, frankly, stupidly expensive. But nobody else makes prescription glasses with explicit design decisions aimed at people who wear headphones all the time.

I haven't received the glasses yet but am hoping they live up to the hype. My issue is the discount code I was sent directly from Gunnar. Which apparently wasn't allowed to be used once I went to pay. Showed the discount in the cart until I tried to process payment. Don't send a code if you're not going to honor it.

Glasses are pretty expensive, but good quality. Chat support was quick and responsive. Disappointed that I received 2 codes to use for my purchase, one for a discount and one for a free case but was then told I could not use both.
Too many emails. I’ve received more promotional emails from you than shipment emails. I’ll most likely return them based off your marketing tactics.

Got a prescription pair of the maverick. When I first open the box I noticed the frames were twisted, so I figured I would just put them back. As I tried to untwist them the one screw striped the thread and came out. So to fix I had to take a longer screw(to grab deeper threads) from another pair to bring the frame back together.So yeah, I love the blue light filter but the lenses were not ground down enough and were forced to fit frame.After half hour of bending this and that, they are mostly straight.

First, I would like to say that the customer service is pretty good, I would like to thank Terry for his constant communication and care for my issues, mostly for dealing with me and my lack of understanding in certain parts of the process. The shopping experience was okay, I ordered a pair of glasses and, unknowingly, there were two in my cart. Instead of the cart saying "Hey, your price is double what you're expecting" you find out later when you're putting in your payment options. Granted, the two frames in the cart was my fault, but the price said $250 (which was the starting price of the frames I chose) regardless. Also, a little more clarity on how long an order takes to be shipped would be great. I'm thinking 7-10 business days, but in reality it could take up to three weeks for your order to be processed and ready for shipping. Upon writing this review, I have not received my glasses, so I can't really speak much on the product itself, but I'm expecting those to come in tomorrow, after nearly a month after ordering them.
So many options with so little information about what suits me better. Also lack of comparison between products on the portal.. sizes aren’t clear and the guideline isn’t helpful.

I use a computer and phone and tablet very often during my typical work day. I definitely need a pair of Gunnar glasses. I have a stigmatism in one eye so I decided to opt in to the corrective vision lenses as well. When I first put them on and I walk around or turn quickly they really throw off my balance, like they are affecting my peripheral vision. Also for $200 (which is the price I would pay for actual corrective lenses) I expected the frames to be less "cheaply" made. Not impressed with the frames at all unfortunately. This is the second pair of Gunnar glasses I have purchased. My original pair from years ago I gave to my oldest son for his gaming. I don't wear them nearly as I thought I would because the frames are also not very comfortable, they squeeze my head and give me headaches from long periods of wear-time.

Review.Contenu: I still didn't get my order , it is already 8 days. Only today it was shipped. I have to ask customer service about this issue. I don't know about quality, previous pair I should return because of magnificence 0.2 (i didn't know that) and eyelash marks on the lenses.

Review.Contenu: Decent haven’t recieved in game content for mw2 calling card for special edition glasses yet not sure when that will come ?

Review.Contenu: Great glasses in a way but not $100 bucks worth.  Better options out there for 50 bucks and lower . Honestly Amazon $20 bucks worth just as good you’re paying for branding.

Review.Contenu: I tried to use the 20% off my "first order " but it wouldn't work at the time it keep saying.

Review.Titre: You want honest comments here you go
Review.Contenu: You want honest comments here you go.  The coupon for the back to school was done incorrectly.  It state ALL glasses site wide*.  Now with the asterisk there are exceptions but you can not find them anywhere, so I started to choose products that came up when I selected the coupon, the interceptor 2 pair, and the $25 mystery box.  When I applied the coupon it said it could not no problem be done.  I tried talking to a customer rep online and they stated that these products were promotional items.  I asked where did it say that say that these were not part of the deal and why did they pop up on page one, when you selected the coupon?  No answer.  I then sent an email to you customer service department, Kenny replied and stated that I was right, the asterisk should have been explained better and been easier to find.  He did give me a coupon to use so I could still get my items, so I am to upset with him just with how the sale was done.  Please in the future have a better explanation for asterisk items and do not include them when customers select the coupon.  This made it very confusing, thank you.Got a reply and they said they changed the site to make it easier to find the products not available on the coupon and it still does not show up anywhere I could find.  Also, the promotional item are still on the first page when you select the coupon, tell me how this is not confusing.  I bought your products, but this is way to confusing to your customers trying to use this coupon, sorry if I am an honest person trying to help.
overall as expected but the "virtual try-on" was a bit glitchy when using it.  Not as smooth as other sites.
Discovery was a little difficult, also I would have preferred the glasses I purchased be available in the Amber Max tint as opposed to just regular Amber.

Review.Titre: I paid for Route service but the…
Review.Contenu: I paid for Route service but the tracking number received is not working.
I missed the case.  A simple pair of readers costing more than $100 should come with a protective case…not a baggie.

Review.Titre: My glasses have a crack out of the box
Review.Contenu: My glasses have a crack out of the box. Box was intact so most likely it was damaged during assembly.

Review.Titre: All models should be available in…
Review.Contenu: All models should be available in natural focus?

Review.Titre: Odd to request a review before the purchase object arrives, but sure, I'll give it a shot.
Review.Contenu: First time using this trustpilot site, but the wording seems to be to review the entire shopping experience rather than just the product itself. Sorry if this gets to be "too" detailed but I'd rather go through it to lay everything on the table rather than just state the highlights (such as extreme positives or negatives) and let people think those are the only things that happen.My experience with purchasing a Gunnar Optiks glasses involved first chatting via the "contact us" page, asking about the ability to remove the "gunnar" logo thats printed directly on the glass, and about which particular glass I might want. Removing the logo is a no go it seems, which is a bit disappointing but they did point me in the direction of what seems like the right glasses. Everything about this interaction was perfectly fine and I have no complaints. So, I actually went through Amazon to purchase the ones I wanted. Turns out some versions on Amazon are "only X in stock" including the one I purchased. Odd, but fine, it is right after the holidays after all. Only problem though, is that when the package arrived, I actually received the incorrect glasses. So, in requesting for a "replacement", I found out that apparently because Amazon shows it as low stock it can't be "replaced" it can only be "refunded" and with no way of communicating through Amazon to the seller (Gunnar I presume). I applied for a refund and had to send those other glasses back. Oh well. Annoying, more than anything.While I had those glasses I did get to test them out a little bit though, and I did like the concept from them. I did find out after receiving them that the pictures on Amazon and also on Gunnar's own website contain images that have versions of the glasses that have no "made in China" sticker/tag on them, which was interesting to see is on the actual glasses. Felt like an attempt to hide where the glasses were made from unless someone particularly searched for the information which is admittedly available on Amazon if I'd looked, but I didn't see it anywhere on Gunnar's site after looking. Probably tucked away somewhere. A little shady, but at this point, who isn't selling items from China and trying to making it seem like they are local, am I right?I did decide to purchase the glasses I "actually" wanted through Gunnar's website instead of hoping it doesn't get screwed up from/through Amazon again. I had made a cart and purchased it essentially immediately, but I did end up hitting a seeming bug in how the website works; the website probably wouldn't have known my email address if I hadn't purchased, but I was pinged a few times in my email about "items in my cart" over the next few days. Nothing too untoward, but an issue to point out.And obviously, as the title states, the review was sent to me before the item even arrived, despite it being tracked.Overall, I think a 3 star review is a bit of a "harsh" choice, but apt. Nothing was particularly "bad", just a bit awkward because of the number of little things that had added up over the process.Edit in response to the reply: The email bringing me to the "review" only stated that it was in response to my "Shopping Experience" so it can obviously be very hard to tell which particular "experience" is intended to be reviewed. Someone might want to make it more explicitly clear what the intent of the review is supposed to be if it is supposed to be about one specific event.

Review.Titre: The quality of the frame and lens was…
Review.Contenu: The quality of the frame and lens was good.  I really liked the fit and finish.  My only issue was with the reflection of my eye on the inside of the glasses which was very distracting.  A good anti reflective coating would make this a 5 star product.  It may not be an issue for some but I couldn't get used to the reflection.

The glasses seem to be good quality.  But they were too wide.  I called the phone number provided in the box but never received a response...If the phone lines don't work, maybe don't have an answering machine that accepts messages and don't add the customer support phone number on a separate card placed inside the box?

Review.Titre: The shopping experience was fine, but the advertising seems false.
Review.Contenu: The shopping experience was fine, except the item I chose (Enigma frame, Amber Gunnar Focus lens) was advertised as anti-reflective. It is 100% not anti-reflective. I think if I had a 4k webcam, I'd be able to take a picture of me reading a webpage and actually read the webpage in the image of my glasses. That's how reflective these things are.

Review.Titre: The site was very laggy and glitchy on…
Review.Contenu: The site was very laggy and glitchy on the iOS system. It also had me reput my payment information several times in because I got my address wrong and it did not properly display this. It would say your payment did not go through or something, then would not indicate where on the site the information was wrong, for example I accidentally put 700 instead of 770 on my address and had no specific notification on it was wrong or not.

The first attempt to buy them got my credit card charged immediately, but the website prompt an error on my postal code. This lead to me having to check with them to remove the charge,Next day, the charge was no longer in my card and I redid the order. I'm still waiting on the glasses to arrive with my prescription.

Review.Titre: They didn’t have the color frames for…
Review.Contenu: They didn’t have the color frames for the lenses I wanted. :/

Review.Titre: the pair i ordered were too strong
Review.Contenu: the pair i ordered were too strong.  i need a 2.5 not a 3.0 so will be exchanging.  I own a pair of gunnars and the old pair is much lighter in weight than the new pair.  I leet you know when i exchange how i like them.UPDATE _ Terry, your emails are not coming thru to me at ALL>  none in my spam etc. Try using a real email program, like outlook where i can reply to it!  This NO REPLY is not efficient.     The trust pilot comes thru from you but no others from Gunnar or Trust Pilot.  there must be a bug in your progam.

Pros: The Fedex delivery to Sweden war super fast.Packaging was niceThe prescription seems to have workedThe design is spot on.Cons:The frames are really plasticky and doesn't feel any more premium than the reading glasses I bought at the gas station.The progressive lenses are not nearly as good as the ones I have in my other glasses. A lot more distortion and a less smooth transition. Granted, those glasses cost more.

Review.Titre: Took a lot of time to be delivered
Review.Contenu: Took a lot of time to be delivered, and the silicon cover on the right was not properly glued, so it just come off everytime... certainly not what one is expecting from gunnar, and made in china, the cost may be a tiny fraction of the sell anyway, here we got the quality, i'm an old customer but the quality of this last ones is regular...

Being able to see the glasses on your face is pretty helpful. The glasses themselves are all actually for a man's head in my opinion as the arms are way too long and do not rest on my ears like they should at all. I have to go get them adjusted by over an inch because they fall off my face otherwise. I don't have a small head either so this is  super unusual for reading glasses for me.

Review.Titre: Premature Review for Items Not Received.
Review.Contenu: Update:Items have been received. Representative was available on the site this time to respond to my inquiries. Friendly and provided the information I needed. Great representative when able to get a hold of someone. Also received an email in response to my review a couple weeks having these new glasses. Happy with product and representatives reaching out to confirm all is well with product.Previous Response:I called customer service though no response. No return call when left a message. Still haven’t received items.

Glasses are nice but they're a little flimsy- for their price i expected a sturdier build. Returns are not free so be sure you like the pair / style before purchasing- kind of hard to gauge even with their virtual try-on. I was going to exchange my pair for a new one because i didnt like the style but not worth it with having to pay return shipping again in case i dont like the new pair either.

Review.Titre: Customer service could be better, actually it could exist at all.
Review.Contenu: I accidentally ordered four pairs of glasses when I only needed three. Immediately upon hitting the send key for the order I left two messages in two different areas of the website to get ahold of you to change the order. It’s been a week since I’ve ordered we’ve had the glasses a few days and I still don’t have a response from anyone. That’s the only reason you’re getting the marks you are.

Love the Cyber model glasses however, I am let down with the plastic frames, they appear whimsical/cheap and easy to break.Previously, I purchased my 10 year old son a pair for his computer usage at home and school. The model he owns retails $29.99 and the frames are equally weak. I guess my expectations were greater for a more durable frame.Great price, they work VERY well for blue light reduction and I would recommend to others only if the frame was stronger.

The lenses are very helpful.  They make looking at the tablet, phone, etc. less tiring on my eyes.  I'm on these devices too much.Having said that, the frames are nothing to rave about.  They don't even have spring hinges.  For the price paid, the frames need an upgrade.  That is why I'm only giving 3 stars.

Review.Titre: Glasses slide down my face constantly
Review.Contenu: Glasses work well enough. They collect dust and fingerprints like crazy. They also slide down my nose very frequently - I have a larger nose than normal so I never have this problem. I would’ve preferred if the part that sits on your nose were not melded into the frame, but instead have separate nose pads so you can adjust the fit accordingly.

Review.Titre: Not only did they send us the wrong…
Review.Contenu: Not only did they send us the wrong product (from a different order), when i called to have them send me the right order, they then dropped the ball again and forgot to place the order to have it sent again. I called several days after and it was then they finally sent me the correct one. I understand times can get busy and they were super nice about it but it was a frustrating experience! They otherwise do have some awesome products!

There’s nothing extravagant here. They get the job done. There’s a slight “magnifying” effect with these that my $10 dollar blue light glasses as well as my $150 dollar Ray-Bans don’t have. Also no hard case included. That’s extra. Not a huge selection of styles which is a major downside! Just a lot of square frames at the end of the day. But the slight magnification is my biggest complaint. Very odd but maybe it’s just my eyes.

I was optimistic...I sent an email inquiring about which glasses have a wide fit, the response never came and a week later I decided to order what I thought would be wide fit computer glasses. They fit tight and I can only wear them for a little bit. I think the lens are great they do help but I wish I would have received a response for the email I sent so that I could have made the right choice.

Review.Titre: You sent me lenses wipes for glasses I…
Review.Contenu: You sent me lenses wipes for glasses I dont even have yet and never provide an updated time for the glasses arrival nor a potential shipping code. Order was marked as delivered by your company so I can only pray now that I get the glasses I spent three hundred dollars on. ----Was reached out to by customer service, received glasses but one lense is so warped it causes massive discomfort until you subconsciously ignore it

I really like the glasses I received, and at a decent price. Unfortunately, I received one of the two pairs missing a logo bar on the side. After multiple emails with customer service I still haven't received the piece to super glue on myself or a replacement pair. Good thing I'm working from home, I won't be able to wear them out missing a piece. Overall, I'm still happy with the glasses, but the customer service dropped the ball.

Review.Titre: this is my second pair i’ve bought from…
Review.Contenu: this is my second pair i’ve bought from gunnar and this time around i’m really not happy with it. everything’s good besides when it arrived there was a really deep scratch on the left lens. so that’s my only problem, which is the worst problem you can have when it comes to glasses. it’s so deep i can see it when i wear them. stuff happens i get it, but still isn’t cool spending all that money on a damaged product.

Review.Titre: Mobile Experience for Submitting Prescriptions could be improved, but otherwise a happy customer
Review.Contenu: Honestly, it was a real pain to submit the order with the prescription because I needed to attach photos so they could do a mesurement. I have no webcam and the mobile site experience from my phone leaves much to be desired for this piece.I managed, but its a user experience that could use improvement as not everyone is that tech savvy.  Otherwise, pretty happy. Just patiently awaiting my actual glasses. (Got the add-ons shipped seperately.)

I saw the price tag for the Razer glasses which was $100. So I added to cart then went to checkout. Except when I got to checkout, the 100 was in US and it had shipping fees. This meant the glasses just doubled in price. If only the website had translated the price from US to the customers locations unit of price, then this surprise would be avoided. Overall however was average

Review.Titre: The lenses are darker than I expected
Review.Contenu: The lenses are darker than I expected, and darker than the $6 pair they replaced, but I'm assuming that is better for my eyes.  They are certainly more comfortable!  I don't believe they actually block blue light so I returned them.

The frames require more flexibility. They break easily and you cant get them fixed quickly. If you can it's hard to find a place that will do it quickly. For the price, they should be at a protection level of 95 on all the products. Blu rays are everywhere and we all need as much protection as possible. Otherwise, they are very helpful and do reduce eye tearing when you use a screen protector for double protection.

Gaming/sleep holiday bundle is what I bought, and I like it for its bluescreen blocking effectiveness......my problem however is that these are very uncomfortable with headsets that go over the ears, unlike the old gunnar glasses that I have, these new ones are uncomfortable.They work as intended, just uncomfortable

Fast and good deliveryI had some problem with extra fee for delivery, they told me that it's written somewhere that this isn't their problem (probably true, didn't verify), but I guess I'm used to use big company like Amazon, who take care of everything, tell you "You need to pay x$ and that's it" instead of the "We do the minimum and you might have a surprise at the end"Good product

Tried calling to check and order and spent roughly 10 minutes on the phone with an automated system that got me no where. After the 10 minutes the system hung up on me, and I had to call back to once again get no help from an automated answering system. The only reason I’m given three stars is because the website was fairly easy to navigate and gave a lot of information about each type of glasses

Review.Titre: The reason I am writing the "POOR"…
Review.Contenu: Before you purchase, note one important thing. Most GUNNAR eyeglasses doesnt have 10 cent-costed rubbers on the frame :i.imgur(dot)com/1RCXdKo.pngand they are not comfortable when I used them for hours with headphones (because they make more pressure on plastic onto ears).  There needs to be some soft/rubber materials.In other aspects, I cant say anything.

I ordered new glasses, the next day, I got an email stating that my 'cart' was not complete.  I followed the link and completed the order.  Gunnar duplicated my order and sent me 2 pair of glasses.  I guess I will just keep them both, but this was kind of shady.  Buyers beware if this happens to you.

My order was lost for awhile in a former employee's email, which somehow they never got access to before they left.  Tried calling a few times after that got straightened out, always went to voicemail.  No response from CS, until the day after it had finally shipped.  The customer service agents were pleasant and knowledgeable, but near impossible to contact.  Might be a bit understaffed.

Review.Titre: Blue Light blockage is good; facial fit, not so much
Review.Contenu: The glasses work from a computer standpoint, and they look good on my face, but they are clearly made for men (pro tip: you can't just stick female faces on your website to sell products: it would help a lot if the products actually WORK for women). They are very loose on the sides of my face and over my ears; one hard sneeze or cough and they'll fly off my face. I'll have to take them to an eyeglass shop and see if they can be adjusted.

I'd love to give a higher review, but at this point I cannot. The glasses are great, truly, except I received a pair with about a 3/4" scratch on the inside of the left lens right in front of my eye.I have contacted support almost the minute I opened them (Saturday 08/24 - I don't expect a call/email till Monday+) and will update this review when a we come up with a solution.

Review.Titre: I like that your glasses block the blue
Review.Contenu: I like that your glasses block the blue light and protect my eyes but the reason I made my recent purchase is because I had to pairs of glassed the broke. On the first one that broke it was the hinge which was plastic and I know you have corrected that by making it metal now. the second one the plastic frame broke on the top around the lens. I do like the glasses so I ordered new glasses to replace the 2 broken glasses.

Review.Titre: Misleading product or I am dumb *shrug*
Review.Contenu: Great customer service.  Product is disappointing.  Not sure if I misunderstood the point of the Amber-React tint, but they certainly don’t work as sunglasses.  The image showing each tint is extremely misleading.  Nevertheless, for use in front of a screen, they are great.

Review.Titre: Good to see through, will reflect your screen image
Review.Contenu: Great packaging, quality frame and lens.  Lens is better than lesser cost units I’ve tried in the past.  I am disappointed in the anti-reflective coating.  I upgraded to these for that purpose, and they are no better.  If that is not important, then these are certainly good computer glasses.

Review.Titre: I checked the one day shipping
Review.Contenu: I checked the one day shipping, however it charged/ordered ground shipping. Not a huge deal but I went back and looked and it won't update when I try it again. Not sure if this is a touch. Excited for the glasses though.

I'm not sure the FPS is worth its price, to be honest. Build quality is average, and it's not like I'd wear it out on the streets or anything. It's light, but if you're wearing headphones over it, you're gonna feel it anyway. Really dislike the nose pads - they're not as adjustable as intended.

Review.Titre: Lenses Wonderful, Frames Dollar Store Quality
Review.Contenu: The lenses are wonderful. Functionally the glasses were just what I was looking for. But for $100 I had expected the frames to feel sturdy and of higher quality. These frames feel like they came from the dollar store. But again, I am overall satisfied with my purchase.

Review.Titre: Too much lens reflection, otherwise good
Review.Contenu: These glasses definitely seemed to reduce eye strain but the lenses are highly reflective on both sides and very distracting to look through. Tiny images of the room and windows around me are reflected right back in my eye.  This only goes away if I cup my hands around the outside of the glasses to make sure no light enters on the sides.The tint and the slight magnification were relaxing and helpful to reduce eye fatigue, but for the price they should offer anti-reflective coating.

Review.Titre: The product is amazing but the…
Review.Contenu: The product is amazing but the experience to order the product was sub-par. It took me an hour to order it because every time I left the cart I’d have to retype all my information again. Would like to see an updated website. The product itself has been excellent and have helped me avoid headaches and not strain so much!

They sent Wrong prescription glasses and they promised to send a new Prescription glasses with Right Prescription. And they sent the New Prescription Glasses and you know what, the prescription is still wrong!! not as much as previous one but still wrong. This can cause migrain and headache!! I don't recommend GUNNAR Prescription as they don't make the glasses pricisely right to the prescription, I never had problem with inaccurate prescription from other brand like Essilor. So this is really bad experience from GUNNAR Prescription glasses that is quite expensive! I don't really use the glasses as it has wrong Prescription.

Review.Titre: Love the products frame, in all.
Review.Contenu: Cool product enough, to where id like wear them more often, but the acent 65 35 is tooo to dark! Id probably get a different pair next rime if they werent a lirtle costly. Ill probably return this set if nothing else!  Should have more magnification as well! Also the hugs the back a little tightly!

Review.Titre: I ordered my glasses almost a week ago…
Review.Contenu: I ordered my glasses almost a week ago and just yesterday I got a tracking number but no info on the carrier or a potential delivery date. I know times are tough right now but I have ordered many other products from other companies and have either received them or atleast have a date to expect them.

Review.Titre: Haven't received the glasses yet but…
Review.Contenu: Haven't received the glasses yet but I'm sure they will be good.I just had one thing I wish it had a price conversion for internationals or even just actually have the USD shown as I'm Australian and didn't realise it was US so thought I was spending $80 ended up spending like $140

The frames are nice and seem to be of decent quality however, wearing them causes a dizzying effect for me. They created more eye strain while working on a computer and caused a headache. The small frames are still very loose and do not feel secure. I feel that these glasses are not worth the $80 I spent on them. This is my own individual case and should not be a deciding factor on someone else's purchase as their experience may be completely different. Ordering was simple and shipping was within reason.

Review.Titre: Glasses fit great and I like them but…
Review.Contenu: Glasses fit great and I like them but cleaning cloth was not in box like the advertisement said and the glasses were covered in some kind of white dust. Not sure what dust was. Overall I’m am happy with my purchase. Was just those two minor things that I have to nitpick about.

Review.Titre: Love the glasses but I did not like the…
Review.Contenu: Love the glasses but I did not like the fact that you guys shipped the wrong glasses and I had to wait for you guys to ship out the right ones until I shipped the wrong ones back to you.  Should have been in the mail carriers hands on the way to my house immediately.....but they are sleek glasses!!!!

My first pair of glasses I got the Trooper frame with the amber lenses two years ago.  I have been very happy with those glasses.  I decided to get some clear lenses, so I chose the PPK frame with clear lenses.  I am considerably less happy with these glasses.  They get reflective glare spots from every light source and do not hug my face very well.  Every time I look down they fall off my face.  So I have mixed emotions about Gunnar right now.  I was really hoping these glasses would be as good as my last pair.
