In your augmented reality ‘Virtual Try-on’ feature, all of your glasses look like they were created in Microsoft Paint. Snapchat glasses filters look better in every example I've seen. I’ve purchased 4 pairs in the past, so hopefully the ones I ordered are up to the same quality!

Glasses?  5/5.  Love these.  But they totally ignore insurance.  For my $300 purchase, I got $80 back from insurance, and that capped out my insurance for the year.  I'd have gotten 2 pair of $400 prescriptions had I not wasted my insurance benefit on gunnar.  When I asked which insurance companies they work best with, nobody had any clue or any desire to find out.  If you're paying out of pocket, you'll have a great experience.  If you're going to try to use your vision insurance, expect a 1/5 experience with Gunnar.

The glasses are stylish, classy, and comfortable. They do protect my eyes. However, when I'm watching something with a dark background on the computer screen the glasses cause there to be ghost images on the screen. Not very cool. Also there is some kind of reflection but I don't know where it's coming from but it's like there's two small blue lights in both the right and the left lens. Pin hole size but they're definitely there at times and I don't understand that. That is why I'm giving it rating of 3 stars

All was well. I did however hear GUNNAR offers a 5% discount to veterans at checkout via ID.meUnfortunately I did not see that option anywhere, so I don't believe that actually offer a veteran discount.

Made in China... Tried to find out this info on the website before I sent my order, but figured I would take the chance.  Not trying to be racist or whatever society calls it now, but I am trying to be an American patriot, since I'm 3rd generation American born and proud of my country. Besides that, they're good glasses. Lightweight, comfortable, and I did notice my eyes felt a bit better after just a couple days of use. I would just suggest being more forthcoming about where your product is manufactured since you advertise being started in America by a husband and wife.. You make it seem like this is an american product but it is, in fact, not.

Glasses are cheap in quality, they feel like something you can get at a department store. They are stylish. Main problem is they have a slight magnification even on the nonprescription lenses. They caused headaches for me instead of relieving them.

Quality of the frame at the hinges is poor and misaligned. I'm not sure how effective they are, as I can't wear them with my headphones. The plastic is hard and thick, which increases the pressure pushing on my head with headphones on.

The glasses seem great honestly, but they are so tight on my head that they are useless. I have a bad headache after 5 minutes with them on because they squeeze my temples. Hopefully I can get a refund. Other than that, the glasses seem solid.

Review.Titre: I wish I could review them
Review.Contenu: I would love to review my product but I haven’t received them yet. I would be glad to change this review once they show up but usps is taking their time getting them here. How long do I wait for reporting a lost package with you?

The glasses are GREAT! The frames are so cute and they block the blue light so well; however, I wish they had come with a hard case to protect them, which I feel like should have been included given the price.

Review.Titre: Cheap Plastic Frames, but great customer service
Review.Contenu: Gunnar Order #240825$200+ Enigma Prescription GlassesPurchased in 10/19, ~18 months later, stress marks in the frame, which were initially just unsightly, finally broke and rendered the frames useless. I've never had a $3 pair of reading glasses break in this manner, let alone a $200 pair. I keep this in a temperature controlled area, they never leave my apartment, and the worst stress they've been exposed to is being on my face when I've fallen asleep in them.  The lenses were great but it's hard to use them without frames.UPDATE: Gunnar Customer Service reached out and replaced the frames for free, shipping 2-day expedited. I appreciate them standing behind their product.

It can’t be anywhere near 5stars, because i had to pay double of it’s price because of shipping. Not anywhere is mentioned that I have to pay another 20$ for toll fee if buying from Europe. There isn’t any compensation for it aswell.

Ordered a pair of readers with clear lens but unfortunately the lens has a yellow tint. Had to return them and pay for the shipping.The company seem to not care one way or another why I was returning the glasses. I was never asked.

Great glasses but very difficult to ascertain frame size without opening the description of every pair of glasses.  This metric should be searchable.  Also, provide all lens options for each frame (i.e., 98% amber in Haus frameset).

I ordered prescripcion lenses. I wanted to find easy and clear information on everything that i would need to do regarding the prescription information needed, especialy ordering from another country. It was kind of difficult!  Took me a while to go ahead and order, hoping that everything would go smooth. I order in the past gunnar lenses (no prescriptions) and the delivery was terrible since the lenses arrived from the shipping all wracked. You were kind enough to replace them. This time I order a hard case as well, hoping that you put my glasses in there, before you send them to my country. I hope you can or at least make sure they are well kept in a hard, solid package.Other than that i Must say that I LOVE Gunnar Glasses style, looks, protection, etc..  it is just amazing. Thank you!!

Review.Titre: I reached out to support immediately…
Review.Contenu: I reached out to support immediately after placing my order and never heard anything back. I still haven't heard anything back. I needed to make a change to my order that shipped FIVE DAYS AFTER I REACHED OUT TO SUPPORT. You had plenty of time to fix the issue I have. Now I have a product on its way to my house that will very likely need to get shipped back.I'm so disappointed.EDIT: A day after posting this review a customer service representative reached out to me to help resolve my issue. I have received a pair of glasses and began wearing them today. I'll update this to three stars while I test the glasses and will report back if my review changes.

Review.Titre: I cant give  you 5 stars because the…
Review.Contenu: I cant give  you 5 stars because the site was not letting me make the "buy" cuz u guys have sold out ur free package on 1rst buy, wich i had forcefully drop from cart.. sad cuz i wanted it.. anyways i spent like 30 mins on that fail buy issue. Depending on how good these glasses are ill probably buy more.. the rest is all good.

The purchase was almost perfect.My first order was canceled due to security issues that I understand. By the time they told me it was too late and I couldn't take advantage of the offers.With my second order everything went wonderfully.By the way, excellent customer service via chat.Thank you so much.

Review.Titre: The ordering process was a bit…
Review.Contenu: The ordering process was a bit disappointing. I thought I had a bonus (a free case), but that turned out not to be for my region. I’ve ordered two additional pairs and now have a total of five pairs - that is if my family would stop “borrowing them” lol. Great computer glasses.

Most of the experience was great. The CS rep who emailed back and forth with me was prompt and helpful. The time it took to get my glasses made sense. Ordering and the website are intuitive and good.As soon as I confirmed my order I started receiving at least one email a day regarding deals about purchasing pairs of glasses. Early black Friday deals specifically. Now, I paid full price for my glasses. I'm not a baby. I know sometimes sales happen after you place an order. The company doesn't owe me any kind of sale price on my purchase or anything. It was bad luck.Did they have to bombard me with email, after email, after email regarding these sale prices and offers on new pairs of glasses when I didn't even have the glasses I ordered in hand yet?! Seems like a bit of an oversight. My recommendation would be to delay the email blasts until after the ordered items have shipped.

Overall good experience shopping. I would like to have the option to sort my options by Bestselling, Price, Customer Preferred/Reviewed, etc. I haven't received them yet, so I can't speak to the quality, but I've heard nothing but good things about them.

Gunnar optics was recommended to me by my eye doctor because I needed amber glasses to help me see better while driving day and especially nighttime. My order will arrive in a day or two.  Would like to have seen on your web site a category of glasses directed toward Anytime/Driving.  Hard to find your glasses that assist with anytime wear and driving in your web categories of Computers, Gaming, etc.

Item was flagged as shipped on August 7th via email notification, USPS shows label was created and then cancelled on same day. After 3 days I reached out to support and they quickly confirmed that the item was indeed shipped and provided a new tracking number.

Review.Titre: It would get a 5 star if they didn't…
Review.Contenu: It would get a 5 star if they didn't have the logo on the left lenses.

Review.Titre: I love my glasses and how they look
Review.Contenu: I love my glasses and how they look. I was dissatisfied with the communication since I received a confirmation email and hadn’t heard from them since. I downloaded the “Route” and “Shop” app and neither had shown anything until 2 days before it arrived. Simple miscommunication that I got way too angry about. As the company grows I hope they can consider some kind of “progress update”, if it’s even possible, for the impatient hot heads like me.

I love my new glasses except for one thing,The lenses were not balanced. I have only one eye so glasses with prescription just one one side draws attention to that fact by not having the same or any magnification on that side.  I guess I could have stressed that a little better.

Review.Titre: Incomplete Order, But Support Was Very Helpful in Correcting It
Review.Contenu: I received my Stark Industries model glasses, and so far, I have noticed significant reductions to digital eye strain that I was experiencing at the end of the work day, however I did not receive the lens cleaner kit that I ordered along with it. ~$10 add-on, but still makes my order incomplete.Glasses get 5-stars from me, they do what they are designed to do. However, I have to give the service a 1-star review since this was my first experience purchasing from this company and my order was not completely fulfilled, despite the tracking info saying otherwise.Review Edit: Changing review to 4-stars after Gunnar Support reached out and sent me a replacement lens cleaner kit at no cost to me thanks to the Route protection plan I purchased. Angela S. was very quick to respond and polite.

Review.Titre: Sexy glasses for a non sexy man
Review.Contenu: I really liked the option to try on glasses virtually, my only issue is that the color doesn't change depending on what you pick, it's always the Amber coloured lense instead of clear for instance. (Even when clear is selected) If that could be changed that'd be great.

Review.Titre: Tech Issues aside, everything else was top notch
Review.Contenu: Shopped at gunnar.com for some glasses and had trouble with the virtual try-on feature. I didn't want to buy without trying, so I emailed customer support. They suggested I try using my phone instead of the computer browser. That worked and I purchased my lenses with no problems. I got several emails after purchase reminding me to buy what I left in my cart (which was nothing) so that was annoying. Support was understanding and fairly quick. I got my glasses in a couple of days, and they're great.

Review.Titre: Professional customer service and a couple suggestions for improvement
Review.Contenu: Angela professionally handled a partial fulfillment of my order. One item went out of stock, and I was informed there was no way to keep it open as a backorder or be notified when the item was back in stock. To improve the experience, both of these options should be considered for future implementation. Thank you!

Negatives-Shipping took way longer than I expected. The 2 day shipping is a bit misleading when the product takes weeks to make. I wasn't expecting 2 day turn around, but I wasn't expecting 30 days either-no ability to call in and make changes. I entered the wrong PD and was concerned it was going to production before I could correct. I had to send an email and wait for a responsePros-The frames and lenses are high quality. So far they were worth the wait.-My insurance covered most of the cost (they are out of network)

Review.Titre: Overall website is good I just think…
Review.Contenu: Overall website is good I just think that there needs to be more pics of the glasses and higher resolution photos. Some of the color ways only have a single photo from the front. When you don't have the physical object in front of you more pictures to look at help.

Review.Titre: I expected at least a box to store my…
Review.Contenu: I expected at least a box to store my glasses or cleaning cloth. I ordered a prescription glasses which was so costly (than normal ones) but no accessories were given to maintain. The make and fitting were very good though.

Review.Titre: Great Product and experience!, Hopefully a matte finish will come soon to the gaming glasses.
Review.Contenu: Everything was great!.. but one item was not in stock and it is kind of a bummer.  The clear lens was available in other frames but not the clear, which doesn't make sense as they are the same lenses and size just different frames.  I also wish you had frames in a matte finish.

Review.Titre: Everything was Ok! except for one detail.
Review.Contenu: The product quality is awesome as Always. Excellent product, brilliant design, and fair value. The problem that I see is the tracking process. I paid, and I could not see any progress on the website, I just had to wait without any feedback about time or ETD. It was worrying not to be able to know what happened to the purchased product.

I love these glasses. Have been wearing them since 2013 and never had eye strain.The only downside that i have now is the reflection on video calls. The party at the other side of the camera can see what is on my 2 screens from the glasses.Beside this, I can only recommend them, either for gaming or working on the pc.

I really love these glasses - super stylish and I believe they work because I don’t feel the burning eyes or eye strain while using my devices or watching TV - I just wish I could have better sizing but I can live with that given all the benefits!

Review.Titre: Better alternative than buying gunnar prescription glasses
Review.Contenu: The Clip ons are great. I bought Prescription glasses from gunnar, but right now I am having a problem with them... distorted areas, causing headaches, and just not usable.I bought the clip ons because I needed a blue light filter on my glasses ASAP. They work great! Although how they attach to your glasses could be better. It doesn't fit on to my glasses perfectly (I have thick frames) but it stays on still.I took one star off because they look like they break EASILY. VERY EASILY

I love the gamer glasses, these glasses haven't arrived yet. The only Reason that I gave 4 stars instead of 5 stars it's because I ordered these glasses and they were on back order. The problem with that is that I didn't know that it was a back order so I was looking forward to receiving them sooner. I will Do an update Once I receive the Tony Stark game and glasses. As far as all the other gaming glasses that I purchase from this company, they are awesome. I get these glasses for myself and for my youngest son who is also a gamer. Thank you so much And keep up the good work. If you are looking for great glasses To protect your eyes then Look no further, These glasses will definitely meet your expectations

Review.Titre: The glasses received were exactly as…
Review.Contenu: The glasses received were exactly as described in the pictures on the website, the right size and beautiful color. I am very satisfied with it, good quality and fast delivery.

lenses are great. The biggest difference is my eyesight is better and my eyes can go for a longer time. my only issue is the frame is a bit short for my head and im not sure if there was an option to get an extended frame. otherwise greast product and looks good

Review.Titre: i havent recieved my specs yet
Review.Contenu: i havent recieved my specs yet, but the buying process was easy and when i didnt have all the information the rep who reached out to me was helpful and prompt

Review.Titre: Shipped on time as Gunnar promised.
Review.Contenu: I have to admit I have not tried the computer glasses yet, but they  showed up right on time just as Gunner  Promised they would.

Review.Titre: Great design. Look like Tony. But Tony could afford better quality frame materials.
Review.Contenu: The design of the glasses are great. Gunnar sun lenses are stellar for my eyes.The case is nice too.My only gripe is with the quality of the frame itself. They feel flimsy and cheaply made. Unless you are the huge marvel or Tony stark fan, I would pass on these due to the price. You'll get more for your buck with the Maverick frame, (They don't feel flimsy in the hands).

Review.Titre: I was hoping to get a discount code for…
Review.Contenu: I was hoping to get a discount code for the purchase. I get the emails but unsubscribe because I can only buy glasses once a year.... I'm just not that rich... I wish I could get the emails that have discount codes only.
My eyes feel the freshest they have felt even after a long work day in front of a computer or hours of gaming

Review.Titre: It is flexible and fast to find what…
Review.Contenu: It is flexible and fast to find what you want exactly but as some of the products are new you may not find it in general Gunner glasses and sunglasses safe my eyes really
Overall a good/easy ordering experience.  Until I receive my order, this is the update so far.
Great Product with a good Price.
It took a long time, was sometimes confusing. They are good glasses and have been very helpful. They are quite light though.

Review.Titre: Easy to find what I needed
Review.Contenu: Easy to find what I needed, but should explain better what each item is for in the preview.
The actual order was a bit slower to ship out than I expected, but the response from the customer service about the status of the order was very quick and informative.
I was looking for reading glasés with fixed measures. Found it here.

Review.Titre: “Sometimes you gotta run before you can walk.”
Review.Contenu: Look phenomenal, works well, could be more comfortable
Good products, good quality for daily usage.

Review.Titre: You can see the blu blocking difference
Review.Contenu: Very thorough.

This is the first company that doesn't send an order confirmation via email and there's no tracking on the package. Luckily it arrived within a week but a real lack of communication with the customer on the order. I just received my order so I'll see how the glasses turn out.

Gunnar Optiks offers great glasses. However, the reading glasses section was a little lacking this time. I did buy the kids glasses for gaming however, I ended up going elsewhere for mine as I need readers. I have been with Gunnar for years, I just don't like the styles available for readers. Sad, they produce quality glasses at ok prices. They just have not kept any styles old folks might like.

I bought a pair of gunnars. They arrived about 12 days later on 2-day shipping only to have a cut on the lens near the logo on the inside of the lens. Had to put in a ticket or something similar and they responded that day and even sent new ones via priority shipping within about 2 days. First time in a while where ive experienced a business own up to a mistake/issue so promptly. Kudos.

I have a big head. So I need glasses with arm length of 145mm minimum. And I couldn't find anything that fits the requirement. So I bought one and hope that it won't fall off when I lean down. Otherwise I will have to return it.Please provide options with longer arm lengths.Otherwise I really love the designs of the products. Would have bought more expensive and cool looking one if there were more size options.Edit: the glasses don't fall off and despite being on the smaller side for me wearing them wasn't uncomfortable. Would buy again from here.

Absolutely love being able to "preview" what the glasses would look like on me. I changed which ones I actually got from what I originally wanted to get :) The one gripe I had was having to leave the preview window to change which glasses I wanted to preview. It didn't seem to load a new selection from within that window. It would also be cool if it would temporarily save an image so you can easily compare different glasses you've tried on.

Everything from looking through all the styles to ordering them to receiving were great.  I particularly liked how you could virtually try on the frames to see how they look on you.  I noticed an improvement the first time I wore them. My eyes weren't nearly as tired when I wore them.  However, there is one thing I believe can be improved upon; the weight of the glasses.  I work in front of two monitors from anywhere between 8 hrs - 10 hrs per day.  These glasses become very cumbersome heavy as the day wears on. Hopefully this can be addressed with future designs.

Review.Titre: The Vertex Amber Max glasses arrived
Review.Contenu: The Vertex Amber Max glasses arrived. However, there is a Canada customs charge of $10 associated with the purchase. After having paid $29 USD for shipping alone for glasses priced at $50 USD. According to support staff, there is no USPS option for Canada. There should be. Since this would offer a lower shipping rate and avoid any Canada Customs fees.

Review.Titre: The glasses looked and felt great…
Review.Contenu: The glasses looked and felt great overall. They definitely work great for computer time. My only minor issue was the lenses were curved causing more distortion in my proessives then I expected or liked. However, a quick adjustment at my optometrist and all became clear.

Review.Titre: The blue light blocking glasses are…
Review.Contenu: The blue light blocking glasses are less expensive than most places. And they definitely work!! I bought 3 pairs; one Sun, Amber and Amber Max all in the Onyx frame. The only reason for 4 out of 5 stars is the icons / logos they place on the upper side of the left lens. They are in my eye line and make me think they are dirty or I am seeing something. Unfortunate they felt the need to place these icons on the lenses that cannot be removed.

Review.Titre: Get the aviator style glasses; you won’t regret it!
Review.Contenu: Absolutely LOVE the glasses! They look even better in person and I love the frame on them too. I bought the aviator style. I would have given a 5 star review, but I noticed that the lens slightly zooms everything in. I don’t wear prescription glasses, so I noticed this slight change. Tomorrow will be my first time wearing them to work (I work on a computer all day) and I’m excited to see how I adjust to wearing them for several hours at a time and how I feel afterwards.

Review.Titre: Finally a company with some customer service
Review.Contenu: From my phone there was no option to chat with anyone so I filled out the contact question form and no one got back to me. Once I found out there was chat available on the computer my experience improved greatly. The chat person was very helpful. She helped me get ahold of an RX guy that was also very helpful. I am very impressed with the price and the fact that my script could be filled. I have tried multiple companies and they were unable to fill my script, or wanted $700 for 35-45 % blue blockers. Can’t wait to recieve my glasses, never thought I would say that.

Honestly, there's nothing wrong with them. They're pretty good at blocking blue light, they're durable (I went camping, got slapped across the face with them, and even slept on them -- they're still not bent or broken), and they look good on me. My only reason for taking off one star is that the amber is too yellow; I feel like Johnny Depp in Blow or something. Wish I would've gotten the clear ones instead.

Review.Titre: I am having my first pair of Gunnar…
Review.Contenu: I am having my first pair of Gunnar Rush for a week. Wearing it after 4pm, when it is growing dark outside during the Fall. I feel the difference, it is much easier to look at my screens in the glasses even though I set the nightshift warmth mode. I will keep using them. After I placed the order, I kept browsing the site and, out of blue, I received a pop-up message offering a discount if I subscribe to Gunnar's. I wish I could get that discount notification before submitting my order. Keep an eye on such a discount ;)

Review.Titre: These have the best optics I've found…BUT...
Review.Contenu: These have the best optics I've found so far, BUT they ruin it by engraving their name into the lens causing the most unbearable distraction. To the point I may not be able to keep waring these glasses. What the hell were you thinking!

Review.Titre: Item arrived a day earlier than…
Review.Contenu: Item arrived a day earlier than expected, this is my second pair and I love them (will be exchanging them for a different pair that fits my style a bit better and their return policy is awesome)Edit: Their exchange policy IS good, but the exchange process if not up to current standards, no shipping label provided, and the process takes about 2 weeks, not really customer friendly.

This has really gotten rid of my headaches. I've been having them every single time I've used my computer but now they're almost completely gone. My only complaint about these clip-on amber gunners they interfere with my peripheral vision, they are way too close my glasses focal point. I could try to bend the metals with some pliers but I would fear breaking. A suggestion I have if possible is there should be ones that come with legs at different distances for different glasses gaps or some sort of adjustability.

I think the glasses so far are very well made and they took a little to adjust to the color but they make everything look a lot nicer. I also think that the care in the way it was shipped and packaged was a nice thing to see. The only thing that I wasn’t able to find were different size frames but other than that they are great.

Review.Titre: I have 3 pairs and really am impressed…
Review.Contenu: I have 3 pairs and really am impressed with the lenses. Prescription Enigmas are the best for me because of the matte onyx finish and the tight fit. Vertex are the worst for me because of the gloss onyx finish is slippery and they will slide off my face. I did not realize Vertex were gloss onyx or I would not have ordered them so replaced them with Enigmas with the RX transitions lenses and love them. Best glasses I have ever purchased overall but rather expensive too. Highly recommended once you find what fits properly.

Review.Titre: Love the Intercept, but the clip-on is just okay
Review.Contenu: The 'intercept' are great glasses and fit comfortably! The 'clip-on amber' is a tad short so when I clip them on to my glasses there is a break toward the bottom of the lens that make it feel like I'm wearing bifocals. Other than that the amber is a great tint and works well for working in front of a computer.

Review.Titre: This will be my second pair of GUNNAR…
Review.Contenu: This will be my second pair of GUNNAR glasses. My first pair had a lot a milage on them and ended up needing to be retired. I bought rhese because I was getting excruciating headaches while working on the computer. I was skeptical but they truly work.

Review.Titre: I want to give you a five stars, but...
Review.Contenu: I want to give you a five stars, because I think you're good! But I had a problem with the shipping. The shipment was cancelled without notifying me. In addition, when I contact with you to solve it, there was no strong argue for stopping my order and this make some delay to my order. However, I want to say thank you.

Review.Titre: The lens quality has changed my life
Review.Contenu: The lens quality has changed my life. I work on computers all day, and that caused me headaches and eye fatigue. Now it's much better. I got so much relief. The one downside is the glasses are too big. When I tried the Menlo glasses on via the website, the glasses looked like they would fit great. In reality, they are too big for my head size, but they fit in the bridge.  I'm happy with them because of how great they make me feel after a long day of screen time.

Review.Titre: It by default comes with a small power…
Review.Contenu: It by default comes with a small power and that causes discomfort for some and for exchange or return they don't send return label. You have to pay for it. The customer services take many days to respond and they do not respond to calls.Update on Jan 19 2021: Customer Service provided the label for return and replaced the Glass      with 0 power. Appreciate Customer service and the product performs as claimed

So far pretty good. Seems to really enhance all the txt on my phone and seems to make a big difference when reading long emails. Only downfall is I really like these glasses and spent almost $50.00 on them, so I wished they came with a hard case to protect these great glasses, instead of a soft case. Great Glasses!🤓👍🏻

They’ll work for now.  I like Gunnar overall as a brand for the lens quality above all.  The structure of my last pair was okay, but the nose pieces got bent and one of the pads fell off.  Also the cool neon green coating flaked off quite a bit.  This pair is just solid black so I’m not expecting to happen this time.  The frames feel a bit small for my face but they aren’t uncomfortable.

Review.Titre: Was skeptical at first whether or not…
Review.Contenu: Was skeptical at first whether or not these glasses would do the trick. I find that I often use my iPad after dinner and watch Netflix as well, but would have trouble falling asleep. After a week of use, I found myself getting drowsy earlier which was exactly what I wanted. The yellow lenses take some adjustment and seem to be a bit more hazy than a normal set of glasses (lens quality?) but they definitely do the trick in reducing the blue light spectrum.

Great computer glasses overall. I bought this because I was looking for more quality glasses instead of replacing cheaper and flimsier glasses from amazon. Time will tell if it holds up, but it's reduced my eye strain significantly and I squint a lot less. 1 star deduction because it smudges more than I'd like, and it's tight on my head, though I do have a bigger head than most.

Review.Titre: Easy purchase and shipping. Gift buyers beware of Branded packaging.
Review.Contenu: Purchasing and Shipping went quickly and smoothly! The frames are REALLY thin and flexible, so I'm waiting to see how well they hold up. NOTE: I bought these as a Christmas present for my husband, but the package comes super branded and there is no option for discrete/gift packaging. So when he got to the mailbox before me he found out what one of his "larger" presents was. Kind of disappointing on my side. Other than that, impressed so far!

Review.Titre: Need more details about the glasses so easy to choose the right fit.
Review.Contenu: They work alright I'm not sure if it's supposed  to but I had a glare on the inside. I might have bought the wrong type because  my eyelashes hit the lens and it's very annoying. I'll have to try out a different  pair ill end up giving  these to a friend. Just wasn't the best fit for me

The glasses are well made, fit well and perform as advertised.  I have been satisfied with Gunnar glasses in the past and the quality level continues to be excellent.  I did feel that not including a hard case with glasses of this quality takes away from the positivity of the experience.  However, overall the product is excellent.

Love the glasses, excellent for gaming!.  I would have given 5 stars but some better padding on the temples is needed, while the current thin design is fantastic for gaming headphones, some kind of thin foam/rubber padding on the inside of the temples would make them feel 100% better. Otherwise I am very happy with the purchase.

Review.Titre: The glasses are great, one flaw
Review.Contenu: The glasses are great!  I wear them all the time when on my two 24" monitors for work.  They make my eyes so much more comfortable.  My only complaint is that they smudge very, very easily.  My eyelashes brush the inside of the classes a little and the glasses immediately pick up the oil on my eyelashes and it blurs the vision.  None of my other non-coated glasses do this.  (I wear glasses all the time.)  I got the Gunnar lens cleaner, but it's a PITA to have to clean them every hour or so.

I have the clip on’s and the only reason I gave it 4-stars instead of 5-stars is I wish they were stronger (Amber) for my particular need. But I definitely notice a difference and I bought a pair for my father as well. He said they made a difference as well and wears them all day!

I like the glasses, would give 5 stars but my cleaning wipes was not in my order. I had to contact them they are supposed to be sending them but I haven't received a tracking number yet. I understand that mistakes happen tho and as long as they send them soon I will be satisfied and would recommend.

Edit:The support team reached out to me and offered to replace my glasses and if i still wasn't happy, I'd get my money back guaranteed. I shipped it in and got my new pair within a couple of weeks. My old pair may have been defective in hindsight and I am now happy with my new pair of blue blockers.

Review.Titre: I ordered the Intercept version of the…
Review.Contenu: I ordered the Intercept version of the glasses. They work as well as advertised. The only issue i have is that i have a large head, so the glasses squeeze a little on my head. I feel pressure above the ears. So i cant wear them for several hours without a break. Good glasses otherwise

The Lenses Were Great Really Helped Reduce Eye Strain ,The Only Problem I Found Was A Personal 1 I Think, But Its Kinda Hard To Get The Glasses Positioned Good Since The Sides Go Straight Back, But Its Not That Big Of S Issue If You Youse Headphones They Help keep The Glasses Up In Place.

Review.Titre: Great glasses for reducing blue light fatigue
Review.Contenu: I am very happy with my purchase. The frames are very stylish and the lenses have a nice yellow hue to block out blue light. I find that I have had less headaches when wearing them to work on my computer for long hours. The only reason I did not give this product 5-stars is because the frames are a bit heavy. Over the course of the day I become fatigued by wearing the heavy frames since they pinch the bridge of my nose and the tops of my cheeks. I didn’t have the chance to try them in before I purchased them or not I would have gotten a smaller lighter frame. However, they do the trick and work nicely.

Review.Titre: Intercept eyeglass is OK, but sheadog is excellent
Review.Contenu: I ordered intercept eyeglass for wearing while working on computer. They are very good except the frame. The frame constantly presses on the side of the head and ear and causes pain. The eye glass with metal frame (model: sheadog) ordered from Amazon looks excellent though and deserves 5 star.

The glasses are good quality, the packaging they came in was wonderful, having cleaner and a cloth in the box was a nice touch, and the lenses appear to be doing their job eliminating eye strain. The only thing that could be better is if they were Made in the USA instead of China.

Review.Titre: I love the virtual try-on feature
Review.Contenu: I love the virtual try-on feature. Very helpful for online shopping. Though it has some problem with loading when used on a tablet, using it on PC was pretty flawless other than sometime it doesn't load the lens.

Delivery was great, the materials are good quality. I got the clip-on to use on my glasses unfortunately since my frame is a bit bigger the clip-on doesn't fit as well as it should, still my eyes are resting better, i might other glasses after i take my eye surgery. Keep up the good work!

The shipment arrived really fast! 3 days and i live in south america. The glasses have been prety good so far hope that they last me a while. I will give them 5 stars if they have free shipping over a 100usd instead of 150, anyways, pretty good experience!.
It's comfortable and I definitely see a noticeable change. Haven't had it too long, so I'm not sure how amazing it is just yet. But I can for sure see the difference when I have them on and off.

Review.Titre: Nice experience, recommendations about product information
Review.Contenu: I find the virtual try-on really nice. Nice website.I think there should be any numbers about different measures such as the height of the rims or the length of the bridge so that it is possible to have any idea how to expect from the product as if it is actually going to fit or not.

Review.Titre: Really great blue light glasses that…
Review.Contenu: Really great blue light glasses that are constructed extremely well.  I am having slight eye strain with them that I think is associated with the magnification, especially when viewing light sources that are a few feet away from me.Could just be an issue with me though!

Review.Titre: I didn’t receive the shipment yet but…
Review.Contenu: I didn’t receive the shipment yet but working with fedex shipping company and letting your customers dealing with their poor services is a bad experience for me.I’m hoping that my glasses will be good.Update: I received my glasses and the material feels good with nice fit. The screen color look more calmer, overall nice glasses.I just have one concern about the usage of the glasses, does the gammer glasses can be used for computer and phone or its not recommended i hope you mention that because their is two categories in your website and it’s a bit confusing. Nice glasses nice service 👍

Gunnar Optiks... AWESOME. But, I still haven't received my glasses yet, probably due to the holiday season. But Gunnar Optiks ordering process is excellent and very easy to use. My order is due any day now and I'm looking forward to my new computer reading glasses.

Ordering was super easy and my glasses arrived insanely quick. The glasses themselves I'm pretty happy with. Not as high quality as I was expecting but I guess you get what you pay for. Overall a decent experience but not blown away by the glasses themselves.

Review.Titre: 3 days of use, already noticing a week of difference
Review.Contenu: I've only had them for 3 days but I can tell the difference already. My eyes don't dry out, my screens don't irritate my eyes like they used to, and the transition aspect is a huge help outside. I bought the clear lenses with sunglasses transition. The lenses do have a slight amber tint, but that was to be expected. The transitions will take about 5 mins to full darken and between 5 and 10 mins to lighten back up. Overall I love them. I do wish they didn't have the logo on the lens but it isn't in the way of my view so no too much of an issue there.

Review.Titre: Had problem with website first time I…
Review.Contenu: Had problem with website first time I tried to order. Was little worried as card number had been put in twice. but nice young lady helped me on "chat" and was resolved. Have  the glasses and all good.thank you

Review.Titre: Great pair overall, but smudges way too easily
Review.Contenu: The glasses fit really nicely and look good! I feel like my eye strain isn't as bad when wearing these glasses. They're light and don't really cause the sides of my head to hurt, but they do slide down my nose often (I have that problem with most other glasses anyways)The only downside is that the lenses smudge incredibly easily. Like, so easily that all I have to do is blink to make a smudge. Luckily this pair came with the cleaning solution and lens cloth as part of the holiday pack, but it can get annoying to constantly take my glasses off to clean smudges off.

Disappointed that I paid $29.95 in shipping as part of the purchase, then Fedex charged me another $15.03 in shipping before they would deliver the package!The product itself was packaged nicely and is high quality, so 1 star doc is only due to shipping debacle.

shipping was incredibly fast, even faster than is written on the site. still getting used to the glasses, but they fit very comfortably. currently they feel like they make the strain on my eyes worse, but i think that's just because i'm not used to them yet.

Love the glasses, however the intermediate distance I was expecting for my prescription turns out to be a mere 2-3 foot distance. This makes them useless for anything other than sitting at my computer or reading, can't watch TV or drive while using them.

GREAT QUALITY DIGITAL EYEWEAR.  Good service overall, with some pending improvements needed in order to make it easier to contact the company via Online Chat, Telephone, for questions, follow ups, or concerns.  Email based customer service is good.

Review.Titre: Overall it has helped my eyes not feel dry/sore
Review.Contenu: Overall it has helped my eyes not feel dry or sore after looking at a screen for extended periods of time, but I have notice it can cause a bit of a headache while wearing them, probably just due to my eyes adjusting to them.

Acquisition was handled quickly and professionally.  Anticipated that the modification of the picture by the glasses would be more pronounced.  Time will tell if it helps the eyes.  Product construction was very good.  Will see if the lens scratch easily.

Review.Titre: I like them, but they hurt a little.
Review.Contenu: If you wear headphones 24/7 like I do, then don't by these. It's that simple.  Unless you have pads that are made for glasses or maybe super soft foam. Also they don't sit on my ears, bc they squeeze my head and just kinda float on my head.  Bc of that I do get some minor pain and cant wear them for more than a couple hours, so I only wear them for a couple hours before bed.With that out of the way, I really do like these glasses.  They have definitely helped with night time eye strain, and they have helped me with falling asleep.  Plus I think they kinda look hot on me.  That being said I like them, but your mileage may vary.

Great products! I bought a pair a few years back and decided to purchase another. There was initially a shipping problem but I contacted customer service and they sent out an expedited package which arrived quickly. I am happy with that service.

Review.Titre: Easy order! Amazing Selection! Welcome to the GUNNAR Family!
Review.Contenu: I love how easy it was to order my new glasses! They have many options available and lots of sweet gaming collaborations! My number one reason is for buying GUNNAR glasses is, I have a heavy RX script and after getting turned down by others, GUNNAR has welcomed me and was able to fill my RX, THANK YOU SO MUCH!!!!
Gunnar has a very good selection of high quality glasses at very reasonable prices, specially if you could get them when they are on sale.

Review.Titre: I had an issue with my order..
Review.Contenu: I had an issue with my order. I will admit, mistakes were made by the Gunnar support team-But overall, in the end the team resolved my issue and provided me everything I needed in the end to have a great experience.If you have an issue with support, be patient and diligent and in time the issue will be resolved. The product is fantastic, reasonably priced, and an especially great deal during promotions or sales.

I’m happy with all my orders. I’m definitely a BIG fan of Gunnar products. The styles are amazing & fits my face to perfection. Loved every items I’ve purchased & I am ordering for gifts during the holidays…

Gunnar gave me an affordable option on glasses to alleviate the headaches and fog I was getting from being in the office all day staring at a computer.  I no longer have any brain fog, blurry vision or headaches thanks to the Gunnar's and I get compliments on them all the time!  Thanks Gunnar!

Review.Titre: I'm giving a green/5 star because at…
Review.Contenu: I'm giving a green/5 star because at this stage, all I've received is a shipment containing the foldable cardboard box (glasses holder) and the wipes. If I could give any feedback here, it would be nice to get the package together, as one shipment. I got all excited thinking my (prescription) glasses were here, but that's a few weeks off. No big deal, I am patient and don't expect anything - esp custom prescription glasses - to be rushed. Other than the 'free gift' box, I'm still waiting for the glasses (the main part) of this order.

Very fast and streamlined. I saw a deal from an email I received and jumped all over it. The price matched the one from the email. Checkout went smoothly as well no hiccups or extra steps or things to sign up for great process.

Review.Titre: A Great Experience with a Reputable Company
Review.Contenu: Gunnar Optiks made ordering my glasses quick and efficient, even getting my prescription glasses to me faster than I expected. They kept me very informed about the whole process and packaged everything very well.
I haven't received the glasses yet, but after I ordered them I was notified that they  shipped within an hour.  The website is easy to navigate and check out was seamless.  Great experience so far.
This is my 2nd purchase as the first time was great too. I trust Gunnar for computer glasses above all other brands, they’re very well made and they ship out fast.
Price is right! Great product. Highly recommend. Very satisfied with purchase!!
It was easy to search and take a look into what I felt would be the best fit for me.

I am a massive believer in your products. Since I started wearing Gunnars, my sleep has markedly improved. I have promoted your product directly to people telling me about their sleep issues, and on social media. I'm flat broke, so your Thanksgiving sale was a huge relief to buy a pair of 1.5x... I consider the full price to be more than fair though, and this is now my 5th pair that I have purchased for myself (wearing a pair of no-magnification over my prescription glasses as I write this!)
Great product. These are the best reader/computer glasses I have ever had.I also broke a pair after almost two years and found customer support resounding quickly and to be very helpful.

Review.Titre: The ease of ordering and I got a free…
Review.Contenu: The ease of ordering and I got a free gift card!!!!
Everything went as smooth as silk, except the unexpected extra charge for shipment management.

Like the products, they work well, the website does and is easy to navigate, the same was easy to navigate as well, I do wish you would make safety rated glasses, I am a machinist and on computers all day, either programming the cnc machine or running it, all uses a screen and I hate moving back and forth from gunnars to safety glasses, if I could have both in one, that would be amazing. other than that thank you for having great products keep it up!

Review.Titre: My order was shipped to the wrong…
Review.Contenu: My order was shipped to the wrong location. Customer service made the process easy to fix.

These frames and lenses are outstanding in every way. I ordered the Vertex frames with Amber lens tint and Natural focus (who would ever but "Gunnar focus"???). I wear these all day, they are comfortable and prevent migraines. I even started wearing these at night to see if they helped with the awful blue laser headlights. They really do, no more glare or headlight migraines! The amber lenses do not darken the field of view hardly at all even at night. I'm getting a second pair so i can keep on in my car. I can't recommend these enough.
Find my glasses was easy and check out was a breeze. Liked learning about the company - in fact the company's history is what convinced me to buy from you.
easy to order, nothing else needs saying

Review.Titre: Love the brand and love the aviators I…
Review.Contenu: Love the brand and love the aviators I received hoping there will be different color of lenses for the aviators maybe black frames with red lenses.

Review.Titre: Easy to find exactly what will work…
Review.Contenu: Easy to find exactly what will work best especially buying for someone else. These are a gift. I know it will be quality I can trust.

Review.Titre: Gunnar's shop was easy to navigate
Review.Contenu: Gunnar's shop was easy to navigate, and I found what I wanted quickly.
Quick and easy process, awesome product, helped with my migraines so much and super comfortable to wear!

The glasses I chose feel like great quality and did not disappoint. I’ve had Gunnar’s now for about 8 years and they are still making a great product. The website is also very user friendly, not to mention the live chat option with an employee that can assist you with any questions.

Review.Titre: Give it a go Its a bit pricey but worth it
Review.Contenu: Great Pair of Glasses very happy with everything The Gunnar vision also does not impair sight helps alot with eye relief and as well as looking super stylish I would opt for the shipping insurance sometimes things happen and for a couple extra dllrs you can insure your shipment
Great service !! I love it so much. The eye glasses are amazing. I would buy another pair. Thank you so much !!

Shipping date was accurate, glasses came as ordered, they help my eyes 100%, used to have watery eyes in endgame of Battle Royales and now my eyes feel as fresh as before I started screen time. Thanks Gunnar

I love my new glasses. Not only do I use it for gaming, I’m a city bus operator working the Night Shift. The high beams from on coming traffic and the blue lights from the light poles was causing me insomnia, eye pain and headache. With my new glasses all of those issues are gone.
Nice glasses, I would recommend.

Customer service answered all my pre-purchase questions and helped me get everything ordered. I received and wear my glasses daily, which were replacements for the exact same pair I had been wearing for several years but had become too worn and banged up.  They also helped with spare notepads. I have several pairs of Gunnars (now 4), including custom sunglasses.
First off : Aesthetics of the product I chose.2: performance, my friend let me use his one night while on a long session on COD ,and they shined !
Good fast shipping, Beautiful glasses

Great company - products are high quality and customer service is top notch. I’ve purchased a few pairs of blue light glasses over the last ~10 years and my favs are always Gunnar.On the website, virtual try-on is really cool and useful. It would be cool to be able to filter the options by frame material. I may also buy prescription glasses sometime soon, but my prescription is very high, so it would also be useful to filter the options by prescription range too.

Review.Titre: This is my 4th pair of prescription…
Review.Contenu: This is my 4th pair of prescription computer glasses from Gunnar and I am not disappointed! I used to care what they looked like but the only person that see’s me wearing them is my wife but hey they look cool and I can see! The best thing is they are Gunnar glasses and I can Game for hours a day and my eyes don’t even feel like was looking at the computer monitor for 5 minutes. Awesome!

Terry Albea in your customer service department made all the difference. I had bought a pair of your glasses from an unauturized seller on Amazon.  Terry went of their way to help me resolve my issue even though it really should have been all Amazon. Terry has a true "Above and Beyond" spirit.

For prescription purchase, I was missing a document and Angela guided me to finish that step.  She was very responsive and easy to work with.For your website, I would recommend that you speed up the search resultsI waited for a good deal on prescription glasses for a year.  I hope you guys have more deals more often on prescriptions.  my insurance does not cover it all Look into partnering with more insurance providers so that we do not have to pay out of network costStart including hard case with all the purchases.  hardcases are a must for frequent and not so frequent travelers I have not recieved the product yet, but I own 3 other gunnar products and I am satisfied. I will add more comments once I try out the new product

Review.Titre: Great results require faith in experience.
Review.Contenu: My initial shipment was shipped accidentally to an address other than where I reside. But the great work by (Terry Albea (GUNNAR Support) and your lab staff promised a replacement set of prescription glasses, which arrived today...impeccable, I love the finished product. Thank you very much; money well spent.

Review.Titre: Sophisticated design matching to most shape of face
Review.Contenu: I purchased this Infinite model two times for myself, and my mother and young brother also have it. The Gunnar glasses are very very helpful to reduce eye strain caused by long-term use of computer. Also, the design and matte black colored frame is sophisticated. I hope the Infinite model is renewed with the titanium frame of light weight.

Review.Titre: Gunnar Has Great Customer Service When There Is an Issue
Review.Contenu: I had an issue with Intercept  blue light blocking glasses- the temples were crooked. I informed Gunnar about the problem. They immediately sent me a new pair of glasses which met all my expectations. Well done Gunnar!!!

Review.Titre: These are the best readers / blue light…
Review.Contenu: These are the best readers / blue light glasses I’ve ever worn. They look great and are super comfortable.

Review.Titre: THE Eyewear you need protecting your eyes from screens
Review.Contenu: First, these products are second to none. These are THE blue light glasses to get when you're spending long hours in front of a screen. The designs are fantastic, the quality is superior and the customer service and incredible. Gunnar will continue being the company I go to when I need Eyewear, and I can't wait for my sunglasses to arrive.

Review.Titre: Good and easy site to use
Review.Contenu: Good and easy site to use. Quick shipment. My Grandson will be excited!

Review.Titre: in depth detail of optics(ratio of…
Review.Contenu: in depth detail of optics(ratio of blocked blue light),use,size and dimensons of frame  and customer reviews.
Service was really fast. Glasses are top quality and I can tell how they help my eyes. I spent 10h on average on front of my computer.

Review.Titre: Truly relaxing experience to my eyes.
Review.Contenu: A nice product with fine-tuned lenses, lightweight and durable frame coming with quick delivery service is why I gave them 5 stars. Hope they make more products with frame width of 140 or more for Asians.

Review.Titre: had an admin problem with applying a…
Review.Contenu: had an admin problem with applying a discount code.  angela from support helped me right away.  very kind.  im a big fan of product, and even bigger fan of gunnar people and service.  thank you

Customer service was good - it will be easier next time since I will use my account to order. I really like my new glasses - they are very comfortable and don't hurt my nose.  It was very important I got those new glasses for my job - always think of LUMEN Technologies for your high-speed, tier 1 internet needs, cybersecurity, ddos, ipvpn, ptp, and voice center needs - we are here for you.

Review.Titre: BEYOOOOND the best customer service I've ever gotten!…
Review.Contenu: BEYOOOOND the best customer service I've ever gotten!  Terry Albea was INCREDIBLY helpful, and took care of everything with extreme patience, kindness, and EXCELLENCE in EVERY way!  What a great company you are, and I SOOOO appreciate your amazing service!  I look forward to receiving my order and recommending your company to everyone I know.  Thank you SO much!!!!

Review.Titre: Easy to order and great values.

Review.Contenu: Ordered a pair of Stark Industries blue lens sunglasses as a gift for my daughter on Tuesday and they were delivered today (Thursday), fantastic service and delivery.They are great, so much so that I’ve ordered a second pair for me.
Easy to navigate website and the Black Friday 20/30/40$ sale was amazing!

Amazing glasses, before these lenses I’d get migraines quite often but not since I started wearing their lenses.  I’ve bought like 6 pairs from them by now.  I don’t wear anything by anyone else either anymore.  Their customer service is excellent as well if you have to deal with them.  I’m a disabled veteran and it’s hard for me to deal with customer service but they were really nice and made it easy.  I couldn’t recommend a better company.

First off Customer service is an A++. And the fit and feel are great. Definitely would recommend and I definitely will be back for more. Got the cod coverts coming back for the cod tactical and them loyalty black panthers in due time. Awesomeness!!

Review.Titre: I was searching for Gunnar clip-ons
Review.Contenu: I was searching for Gunnar clip-ons, and received messages a couple of times telling me that they would be in stock soon. And they have been re-stocked.The process of ordering went wonderfully well - especially the part where I was shown how the clip-ons would look on my prescription computer glasses.

Review.Titre: The best glasses I've ever owned.
Review.Contenu: These might be the best pair of prescription glasses I've ever owned. They are super lightweight and I chose the transitions lenses. I only wish they fit inside my motorcycle helmet. I'll definitely be getting a 2nd and maybe a 3rd pair.

I've been using Gunnar Optiks products for years; and I'm very satisfied with the quality of their products and speed of service. My items shipped to my international location in no time. I'm also happy with their prices which remained largely unchanged throughout the years; all of this keeps me coming back when I need a new set of glasses.
Product selection was easy and straightforward. I appreciate the measurements of the glasses in the information sections. Both lens size and temple measurements greatly helped me with my decision.
